summary.span: 提供一些方法，用于创建、处理、搜索数组并对数组进行排序，从而充当公共语言运行时中所有数组的基类。

span.span: Provides methods for creating, manipulating, searching, and sorting arrays, thereby serving as the base class for all arrays in the common language runtime.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类不是属于命名空间。The class is not part of the namespaces. 但是，它仍被视为集合因为它基于接口。However, it is still considered a collection because it is based on the interface. 类是支持数组的语言实现的基类。The class is the base class for language implementations that support arrays. 但是，只有系统和编译器可以派生自显式类。However, only the system and compilers can derive explicitly from the class. 用户应使用语言提供的数组构造。Users should employ the array constructs provided by the language. 元素是中的值。An element is a value in an . 长度是可包含的元素总数。The length of an is the total number of elements it can contain. 下限是其第一个元素的索引。The lower bound of an is the index of its first element. 可以有任何更低绑定，但该下限为零，默认情况下。An can have any lower bound, but it has a lower bound of zero by default. 创建的实例时，可以定义其他下限类使用。多维可以有不同每个维度的界限。A different lower bound can be defined when creating an instance of the class using .A multidimensional can have different bounds for each dimension. 一个数组，最多可以输入了 32 维数。An array can have a maximum of 32 dimensions. 与中的类不同命名空间，具有固定的容量。Unlike the classes in the namespaces, has a fixed capacity. 若要增加容量，你必须创建一个新对象所需的容量、 复制元素从旧到新对象，并删除旧。To increase the capacity, you must create a new object with the required capacity, copy the elements from the old object to the new one, and delete the old . 默认情况下的最大大小是 2 千兆字节 (GB)。By default, the maximum size of an is 2 gigabytes (GB). 在 64 位环境中，您可以通过设置来避免大小限制`enabled`的属性[gcAllowVeryLargeObjects](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/gcallowverylargeobjects-element.md)到的配置元素`true`在运行时环境中。In a 64-bit environment, you can avoid the size restriction by setting the `enabled` attribute of the [gcAllowVeryLargeObjects](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/gcallowverylargeobjects-element.md) configuration element to `true` in the run-time environment. 但是，该数组仍将限于总共 40 亿个元素，而 0X7FEFFFFF 任何给定维度 (0X7FFFFFC7 的字节数组和单字节结构的数组) 中的最大索引。However, the array will still be limited to a total of 4 billion elements, and to a maximum index of 0X7FEFFFFF in any given dimension (0X7FFFFFC7 for byte arrays and arrays of single-byte structures). 一维数组实现， ， ，和泛型接口。Single-dimensional arrays implement the , , , and generic interfaces. 在运行时，实现提供给数组和结果，泛型接口不显示在的声明语法类。The implementations are provided to arrays at run time, and as a result, the generic interfaces do not appear in the declaration syntax for the class. 此外，没有针对接口成员只能通过强制转换为泛型接口类型 （显式接口实现） 数组可访问的参考主题。In addition, there are no reference topics for interface members that are accessible only by casting an array to the generic interface type (explicit interface implementations). 关键的一点需要注意的强制转换到这些接口之一的数组时是成员的添加，请插入或删除元素 throw 。The key thing to be aware of when you cast an array to one of these interfaces is that members which add, insert, or remove elements throw . 对象提供有关数组类型声明信息。 objects provide information about array type declarations. 具有相同的数组类型的对象共用同一个对象。 objects with the same array type share the same object. 并可能不返回预期的结果与因为如果数组转换为类型，结果是一个对象，而不是数组。 and might not return the expected results with because if an array is cast to the type , the result is an object, not an array. 即`typeof(System.Array).IsArray`将返回`false`，并`typeof(System.Array).GetElementType`返回`null`。That is, `typeof(System.Array).IsArray` returns `false`, and `typeof(System.Array).GetElementType` returns `null`. 元素不仅之间相同类型的数组，但也不同类型的标准阵列之间复制的方法; 它处理的类型自动转换。The method copies elements not only between arrays of the same type but also between standard arrays of different types; it handles type casting automatically. 某些方法，如， ， ， ，和，提供接受 64 位整数作为参数，以适应大容量数组的重载。Some methods, such as , , , , and , provide overloads that accept 64-bit integers as parameters to accommodate large capacity arrays. 和返回 64 位整数，该值指示数组的长度。 and return 64-bit integers indicating the length of the array. 不保证排序。The is not guaranteed to be sorted. 您必须进行排序在执行操作之前 (如)，需要进行排序。You must sort the prior to performing operations (such as ) that require the to be sorted. 使用对象的本机代码中的指针的不受支持，将引发对几种方法。Using an object of pointers in native code is not supported and will throw a for several methods. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何之间的整数类型数组和类型的数组的元素复制。The following code example shows how copies elements between an array of type integer and an array of type . [!code-cpp[Classic Array Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Array Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Array Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Array Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Array Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Array Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例创建并初始化，并显示其属性和它的元素。The following code example creates and initializes an and displays its properties and its elements. [!code-cpp[Classic Array Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Array Example/CPP/source3.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic Array Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Array Example/CS/source3.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic Array Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Array Example/VB/source3.vb#2)]

threadsafe.span: 公共静态 (在 Visual Basic 中) 的此类型的成员是线程安全。

span.span: Public static ( in Visual Basic) members of this type are thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 但不保证所有实例成员都是线程安全的。

span.span: Any instance members are not guaranteed to be thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 此实现不提供同步 （线程安全） 包装器; 但是，.NET Framework 类基于提供集合使用其自己的同步的版本属性。

span.span: This implementation does not provide a synchronized (thread safe) wrapper for an ; however, .NET Framework classes based on provide their own synchronized version of the collection using the property.

threadsafe.span: 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。

span.span: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.

threadsafe.span: 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。

span.span: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.

threadsafe.span: 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。

span.span: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要防止对数组进行任何修改，公开只能通过此包装的数组。To prevent any modifications to the array, expose the array only through this wrapper. 集合是只读的只是一个集合与可防止修改集合; 的包装器因此，如果对基础集合进行更改，只读集合反映了这些更改。A collection that is read-only is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents modifying the collection; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, the read-only collection reflects those changes. 此方法为 o （1） 运算。This method is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的示例中的只读包装数组。The following example wraps an array in a read-only . [!code-cpp[System.Array.AsReadOnly#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array.AsReadOnly/CPP/arrayasreadonly.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Array.AsReadOnly#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array.AsReadOnly/CS/arrayasreadonly.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Array.AsReadOnly#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array.AsReadOnly/VB/arrayasreadonly.vb#1)]

span.span: If is not found and is less than one or more elements in , the negative number returned is the bitwise complement of the index of the first element that is larger than .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不支持搜索包含负索引的数组。This method does not support searching arrays that contain negative indexes. `array` 必须调用此方法之前进行排序。`array` must be sorted before calling this method. 如果不包含指定的值，该方法返回一个负整数。If the does not contain the specified value, the method returns a negative integer. 可以将应用按位求补运算符 (~ 在 C# 中，`Not`在 Visual Basic 中) 为负数的结果，以生成的索引。You can apply the bitwise complement operator (~ in C#, `Not` in Visual Basic) to the negative result to produce an index. 如果此索引是一个大于上限的数组，没有任何元素大于`value`数组中。If this index is one greater than the upper bound of the array, there are no elements larger than `value` in the array. 否则，它是大于第一个元素的索引`value`。Otherwise, it is the index of the first element that is larger than `value`. 要么`value`的每个元素或`array`必须实现接口，用于比较。Either `value` or every element of `array` must implement the interface, which is used for comparisons. 元素`array`必须已在提高根据定义的排序顺序的值进行排序实现; 否则，结果可能不正确。The elements of `array` must already be sorted in increasing value according to the sort order defined by the implementation; otherwise, the result might be incorrect. > [!NOTE] > 如果`value`不实现接口的元素`array`未测试的搜索开始之前。If`value` does not implement the interface, the elements of `array` are not tested for before the search begins. 如果搜索遇到不实现的元素将引发异常。An exception is thrown if the search encounters an element that does not implement . 允许重复的元素。Duplicate elements are allowed. 如果包含多个元素等于`value`，该方法返回的仅有的匹配项，并不一定是第一个索引。If the contains more than one element equal to `value`, the method returns the index of only one of the occurrences, and not necessarily the first one. `null` 始终与任何其他引用类型;因此，具有比较`null`不会生成异常。`null` can always be compared with any other reference type; therefore, comparisons with `null` do not generate an exception. > [!NOTE] > 为进行测试，每个元素`value`传递给相应实现，即使`value`是`null`。For every element tested, `value` is passed to the appropriate implementation, even if `value` is `null`. 即实现确定给定的元素到有何`null`。That is, the implementation determines how a given element compares to `null`. 此方法为 O (log `n`) 操作，其中`n`是的`array`。This method is an O(log `n`) operation, where `n` is the of `array`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用来查找中的特定对象。The following code example shows how to use to locate a specific object in an . > [!NOTE] > 该数组创建，其元素按升序排序顺序。The array is created with its elements in ascending sort order. 方法要求要按升序排序的数组。The method requires the array to be sorted in ascending order. [!code-cpp[Classic Array.BinarySearch Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Array.BinarySearch Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Array.BinarySearch Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Array.BinarySearch Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Array.BinarySearch Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Array.BinarySearch Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不支持搜索包含负索引的数组。This method does not support searching arrays that contain negative indexes. `array` 必须调用此方法之前进行排序。`array` must be sorted before calling this method. 如果不包含指定的值，该方法返回一个负整数。If the does not contain the specified value, the method returns a negative integer. 可以将应用按位求补运算符 (~ 在 C# 中，`Not`在 Visual Basic 中) 为负数的结果，以生成的索引。You can apply the bitwise complement operator (~ in C#, `Not` in Visual Basic) to the negative result to produce an index. 如果此索引是一个大于上限的数组，没有任何元素大于`value`数组中。If this index is one greater than the upper bound of the array, there are no elements larger than `value` in the array. 否则，它是大于第一个元素的索引`value`。Otherwise, it is the index of the first element that is larger than `value`. 比较器自定义对元素进行比较。The comparer customizes how the elements are compared. 例如，可以使用作为要执行不区分大小写的字符串搜索的比较器。For example, you can use a as the comparer to perform case-insensitive string searches. 如果`comparer`不是`null`中的元素`array`为指定的值使用指定比较实现。If `comparer` is not `null`, the elements of `array` are compared to the specified value using the specified implementation. 元素`array`必须已在提高根据定义的排序顺序的值进行排序`comparer`; 否则为结果可能不正确。The elements of `array` must already be sorted in increasing value according to the sort order defined by `comparer`; otherwise, the result might be incorrect. 如果`comparer`是`null`，完成比较使用元素本身或指定的值提供的实现。If`comparer` is `null`, the comparison is done using the implementation provided by the element itself or by the specified value. 元素`array`必须已在提高根据定义的排序顺序的值进行排序实现; 否则，结果可能不正确。The elements of `array` must already be sorted in increasing value according to the sort order defined by the implementation; otherwise, the result might be incorrect. > [!NOTE] > 如果`comparer`是`null`并`value`未实现接口的元素`array`未测试的搜索开始之前。If `comparer` is `null` and `value` does not implement the interface, the elements of `array` are not tested for before the search begins. 如果搜索遇到不实现的元素将引发异常。An exception is thrown if the search encounters an element that does not implement . 允许重复的元素。Duplicate elements are allowed. 如果包含多个元素等于`value`，该方法返回的仅有的匹配项，并不一定是第一个索引。If the contains more than one element equal to `value`, the method returns the index of only one of the occurrences, and not necessarily the first one. `null` 始终与任何其他引用类型;因此，具有比较`null`不会生成异常。`null` can always be compared with any other reference type; therefore, comparisons with `null` do not generate an exception. > [!NOTE] > 为进行测试，每个元素`value`传递给相应实现，即使`value`是`null`。For every element tested, `value` is passed to the appropriate implementation, even if `value` is `null`. 即实现确定给定的元素到有何`null`。That is, the implementation determines how a given element compares to `null`. 此方法为 O (log `n`) 操作，其中`n`是的`array`。This method is an O(log `n`) operation, where `n` is the of `array`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不支持搜索包含负索引的数组。This method does not support searching arrays that contain negative indexes. `array` 必须调用此方法之前进行排序。`array` must be sorted before calling this method. 如果不包含指定的值，该方法返回一个负整数。If the does not contain the specified value, the method returns a negative integer. 可以将应用按位求补运算符 (~ 在 C# 中，`Not`在 Visual Basic 中) 为负数的结果，以生成的索引。You can apply the bitwise complement operator (~ in C#, `Not` in Visual Basic) to the negative result to produce an index. 如果此索引是一个大于上限的数组，没有任何元素大于`value`数组中。If this index is one greater than the upper bound of the array, there are no elements larger than `value` in the array. 否则，它是大于第一个元素的索引`value`。Otherwise, it is the index of the first element that is larger than `value`. 要么`value`的每个元素或`array`必须实现接口，用于比较。Either `value` or every element of `array` must implement the interface, which is used for comparisons. 元素`array`必须已在提高根据定义的排序顺序的值进行排序实现; 否则，结果可能不正确。The elements of `array` must already be sorted in increasing value according to the sort order defined by the implementation; otherwise, the result might be incorrect. > [!NOTE] > 如果`value`不实现接口的元素`array`未测试的搜索开始之前。If `value` does not implement the interface, the elements of `array` are not tested for before the search begins. 如果搜索遇到不实现的元素将引发异常。An exception is thrown if the search encounters an element that does not implement . 允许重复的元素。Duplicate elements are allowed. 如果包含多个元素等于`value`，该方法返回的仅有的匹配项，并不一定是第一个索引。If the contains more than one element equal to `value`, the method returns the index of only one of the occurrences, and not necessarily the first one. `null` 始终与任何其他引用类型;因此，具有比较`null`不会生成异常。`null` can always be compared with any other reference type; therefore, comparisons with `null` do not generate an exception. > [!NOTE] > 为进行测试，每个元素`value`传递给相应实现，即使`value`是`null`。For every element tested, `value` is passed to the appropriate implementation, even if `value` is `null`. 即实现确定给定的元素到有何`null`。That is, the implementation determines how a given element compares to `null`. 此方法为 O (log `n`) 操作，其中`n`是`length`。This method is an O(log `n`) operation, where `n` is `length`.

否则，结果可能不正确。The elements of `array` must already be sorted in increasing value according to the sort order defined by the implementation; otherwise, the result might be incorrect. > [!NOTE] > 如果`comparer`是`null`并`value`未实现接口的元素`array`未测试的搜索开始之前。If `comparer` is `null` and `value` does not implement the interface, the elements of `array` are not tested for before the search begins. 如果搜索遇到不实现的元素将引发异常。An exception is thrown if the search encounters an element that does not implement . 允许重复的元素。Duplicate elements are allowed. 如果包含多个元素等于`value`，该方法返回的仅有的匹配项，并不一定是第一个索引。If the contains more than one element equal to `value`, the method returns the index of only one of the occurrences, and not necessarily the first one. `null` 始终与任何其他引用类型;因此，具有的比较`null`使用时不生成异常。`null` can always be compared with any other reference type; therefore, comparisons with `null` do not generate an exception when using . > [!NOTE] > 为进行测试，每个元素`value`传递给相应实现，即使`value`是`null`。For every element tested, `value` is passed to the appropriate implementation, even if `value` is `null`. 即实现确定给定的元素到有何`null`。That is, the implementation determines how a given element compares to `null`. 此方法为 O (log `n`) 操作，其中`n`是`length`。This method is an O(log `n`) operation, where `n` is `length`.

Examples 下面的代码示例演示泛型方法重载和泛型方法重载。The following code example demonstrates the generic method overload and the generic method overload. 创建一个字符串数组，顺序不分先后。An array of strings is created, in no particular order. 数组为显示、 已排序，并再次显示。The array is displayed, sorted, and displayed again. 数组必须进行排序，以便使用方法。Arrays must be sorted in order to use the method. > [!NOTE] > 对调用和泛型方法不查找任何不同于调用其非泛型对应项，因为 Visual Basic、 C# 和 c + + 来推断从第一个参数的类型的泛型类型参数的类型。The calls to the and generic methods do not look any different from calls to their nongeneric counterparts, because Visual Basic, C#, and C++ infer the type of the generic type parameter from the type of the first argument. 如果您使用[Ildasm.exe （IL 反汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)若要检查的 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL)，可以看到泛型方法正被调用。If you use the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) to examine the Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL), you can see that the generic methods are being called. 然后使用泛型方法重载来搜索两个字符串，其中一个脚本并不在数组，另一个是。The generic method overload is then used to search for two strings, one that is not in the array and one that is. 数组和返回值的方法传递给`ShowWhere`泛型方法，如果找到该字符串，否则元素的搜索字符串将介于在数组中显示的索引值。The array and the return value of the method are passed to the `ShowWhere` generic method, which displays the index value if the string is found, and otherwise the elements the search string would fall between if it were in the array. 索引为负，如果字符串不是在数组中，因此`ShowWhere`方法采用按位求补 (~ 运算符在 C# 和 Visual c + +，`Xor`在 Visual Basic 中的为-1) 若要获取大于搜索列表中的第一个元素的索引 str运算结果。The index is negative if the string is not in the array, so the `ShowWhere` method takes the bitwise complement (the ~ operator in C# and Visual C++, `Xor`-1 in Visual Basic) to obtain the index of the first element in the list that is larger than the search string. stri 列表中的第一个元素的索引ng。The index is negative if the string is not n the array, so the `ShowWhere` method takes the bitwise complement (the ~ operator in C# and Visual C++, `Xor` -1 in Visual Basic) to obtain the index of the first element in the list that is larger than the search string. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不支持搜索包含负索引的数组。This method does not support searching arrays that contain negative indexes. `array` 必须调用此方法之前进行排序。`array` must be sorted before calling this method. 如果数组不包含指定的值，该方法将返回一个负整数。If the array does not contain the specified value, the method returns a negative integer. 可以将应用按位求补运算符 (~ 在 C# 中，`Not`在 Visual Basic 中) 为负数的结果，以生成的索引。You can apply the bitwise complement operator (~ in C#, `Not` in Visual Basic) to the negative result to produce an index. 如果此索引等于数组的大小，没有任何元素大于`value`数组中。If this index is equal to the size of the array, there are no elements larger than `value` in the array. 否则，它是大于第一个元素的索引`value`。Otherwise, it is the index of the first element that is larger than `value`. `T` 必须实现泛型接口，用于比较。`T` must implement the generic interface, which is used for comparisons. 元素`array`必须已在提高根据定义的排序顺序的值进行排序实现; 否则，结果可能不正确。The elements of `array` must already be sorted in increasing value according to the sort order defined by the implementation; otherwise, the result might be incorrect. 允许重复的元素。Duplicate elements are allowed. 如果包含多个元素等于`value`，该方法返回的仅有的匹配项，并不一定是第一个索引。If the contains more than one element equal to `value`, the method returns the index of only one of the occurrences, and not necessarily the first one. `null` 始终与任何其他引用类型;因此，具有比较`null`不会生成异常。`null` can always be compared with any other reference type; therefore, comparisons with `null` do not generate an exception. > [!NOTE] > 为进行测试，每个元素`value`传递给相应实现，即使`value`是`null`。For every element tested, `value` is passed to the appropriate implementation, even if `value` is `null`. 即实现确定给定的元素到有何`null`。That is, the implementation determines how a given element compares to `null`. 此方法为 O (log `n`) 操作，其中`n`是`length`。This method is an O(log `n`) operation, where `n` is `length`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将数组中的每个元素重置为元素类型的默认值。This method resets each element in an array to the element type's default value. 设置元素的引用类型 (包括元素) 到`null`，并将值类型的元素设置为下表中显示的默认值。It sets elements of reference types (including elements) to `null`, and sets elements of value types to the default values shown in the following table. |类型Type|“值”Value| |----------|-----------| ||`false`| |所有整型和浮点数值类型All integral and floating point numeric types|0 （零）0 (zero)| ||| |其他值类型Other value types|默认值的类型的字段Default value of the type's fields| 范围，已清除元素行多维数组中。The range of cleared elements wrap from row to row in a multi-dimensional array. 此方法仅限于清除的元素; 的值它不会删除这些元素本身。This method only clears the values of the elements; it does not delete the elements themselves. 数组具有固定的大小;因此，不能添加或删除元素。An array has a fixed size; therefore, elements cannot be added or removed. 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是`length`。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is `length`. ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法来重置一维、 二维和三维数组中的整数值。The following example uses the method to reset integer values in a one-dimensional, two-dimensional, and three-dimensional array. [!code-csharp[System.Array.Clear#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array.Clear/cs/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Array.Clear#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array.Clear/vb/example.vb#1)] 下面的示例定义`TimeZoneTime`结构，其中包含字段和一个字段。The following example defines a `TimeZoneTime` structure that includes a field and a field. 然后，它调用方法以清除的二元素数组中的一个元素`TimeZoneTime`值。It then calls the method to clear one element in a two-element array of `TimeZoneTime` values. 方法将已清除元素的值设置为默认值对象，它是`null`，默认值的对象，它是。The method sets the value of the cleared element to the default value of a object, which is `null`, and the default value of a object, which is . remarks.format: ## Remarks 浅表副本的元素复制，无论它们是引用类型还是值类型，但它不会复制所引用的对象。A shallow copy of an copies only the elements of the , whether they are reference types or value types, but it does not copy the objects that the references refer to. 在新的引用指向相同对象的原始引用指向。The references in the new point to the same objects that the references in the original point to. 与此相反的深层副本复制元素和直接或间接引用的元素的所有内容。In contrast, a deep copy of an copies the elements and everything directly or indirectly referenced by the elements. 克隆是同一与原始。The clone is of the same as the original . 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下面的代码示例克隆数组并演示的浅表副本的行为。The following code example clones a array and demonstrates the behavior of a shallow copy. span.span: Copies a range of elements from an starting at the specified source index and pastes them to another starting at the specified destination index.

summary.span: 保证在复制未成功完成的情况下撤消所有更改。

span.span: Guarantees that all changes are undone if the copy does not succeed completely.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `sourceArray`和`destinationArray`参数必须具有相同数量的维度。The `sourceArray` and `destinationArray` parameters must have the same number of dimensions. `sourceArray`类型必须为相同或派生自`destinationArray`类型; 否则为引发。The `sourceArray` type must be the same as or derived from the `destinationArray` type; otherwise, an is thrown. 与不同，执行任何操作之前验证兼容性的数组类型。Unlike , verifies the compatibility of the array types before performing any operation. 多维数组之间复制时，该数组行为类似于长时间一维数组，其中的行 （或列） 从概念上讲列出了端到端。When copying between multidimensional arrays, the array behaves like a long one-dimensional array, where the rows (or columns) are conceptually laid end-to-end. 例如，如果数组具有三个行 （或列） 包含四个元素从一开始的数组的每个复制六个元素会将复制所有四个元素的第一行 （或列） 和第二个行 （或列） 的前两个元素。For example, if an array has three rows (or columns) with four elements each, copying six elements from the beginning of the array would copy all four elements of the first row (or column) and the first two elements of the second row (or column). 第三个行 （或列），第二个元素从其开始复制`sourceIndex`必须是第一个行 （或列） 的上限加上第二个行 （或列） 的长度再加上 2。To start copying from the second element of the third row (or column), `sourceIndex` must be the upper bound of the first row (or column) plus the length of the second row (or column) plus two. 如果`sourceArray`并`destinationArray`重叠，此方法的行为像的原始值`sourceArray`在前一个临时位置保留`destinationArray`将被覆盖。If `sourceArray` and `destinationArray` overlap, this method behaves as if the original values of `sourceArray` were preserved in a temporary location before `destinationArray` is overwritten. [C++][C++] 此方法等效于标准的 C/c + + 函数`memmove`，而不`memcpy`。This method is equivalent to the standard C/C++ function `memmove`, not `memcpy`. 数组可以是引用类型数组或值类型数组。The arrays can be reference-type arrays or value-type arrays. 如果`sourceArray`并`destinationArray`这两个引用类型数组或类型的两个数组，执行浅表副本。If `sourceArray` and `destinationArray` are both reference-type arrays or are both arrays of type , a shallow copy is performed. 浅表副本是一种新包含对原始与相同的元素的引用。A shallow copy of an is a new containing references to the same elements as the original . 元素本身或任何引用的元素不会复制。The elements themselves or anything referenced by the elements are not copied. 与此相反的深层副本复制元素和直接或间接引用的元素的所有内容。In contrast, a deep copy of an copies the elements and everything directly or indirectly referenced by the elements. 如果此方法将引发异常时复制，请`destinationArray`保持不变; 因此，可以使用受约束的执行区域内 ()。If this method throws an exception while copying, the `destinationArray` remains unchanged; therefore, can be used within a constrained execution region (). 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是`length`。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is `length`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一个委托，将对象转换为目标类型的方法。The is a delegate to a method that converts an object to the target type. 元素`array`逐个传递给，并在新数组中保存转换后的元素。The elements of `array` are individually passed to the , and the converted elements are saved in the new array. 源`array`保持不变。The source `array` remains unchanged. 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是的`array`。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the of `array`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例定义一个名为方法`PointFToPoint`，用于将结构结构。The following code example defines a method named `PointFToPoint` that converts a structure to a structure. 然后，示例创建一个数组结构，创建`Converter`委托 (`Converter(Of PointF, Point)`在 Visual Basic 中) 来表示`PointFToPoint`方法，并将传递到委托方法。The example then creates an array of structures, creates a `Converter` delegate (`Converter(Of PointF, Point)` in Visual Basic) to represent the `PointFToPoint` method, and passes the delegate to the method. 方法将传递到输入列表的每个元素`PointFToPoint`方法并将转换后的元素放入新的列表结构。The method passes each element of the input list to the `PointFToPoint` method and puts the converted elements into a new list of structures. 显示这两个列表。Both lists are displayed. [!code-cpp[Array_ConvertAll#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Array_ConvertAll/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Array_ConvertAll#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Array_ConvertAll/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Array_ConvertAll#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Array_ConvertAll/vb/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `sourceArray`和`destinationArray`参数必须具有相同数量的维度。The `sourceArray` and `destinationArray` parameters must have the same number of dimensions. 此外，`destinationArray`必须已具有已确定了维度，并且必须具有足够数量的元素以容纳所复制的数据。In addition, `destinationArray` must already have been dimensioned and must have a sufficient number of elements to accommodate the copied data. 多维数组之间复制时，该数组行为类似于长时间一维数组，其中的行 （或列） 从概念上讲列出了端到端。When copying between multidimensional arrays, the array behaves like a long one-dimensional array, where the rows (or columns) are conceptually laid end to end. 例如，如果数组具有三个行 （或列） 包含四个元素从一开始的数组的每个复制六个元素会将复制所有四个元素的第一行 （或列） 和第二个行 （或列） 的前两个元素。For example, if an array has three rows (or columns) with four elements each, copying six elements from the beginning of the array would copy all four elements of the first row (or column) and the first two elements of the second row (or column). 如果`sourceArray`并`destinationArray`重叠，此方法的行为像的原始值`sourceArray`在前一个临时位置保留`destinationArray`将被覆盖。If `sourceArray` and `destinationArray` overlap, this method behaves as if the original values of `sourceArray` were preserved in a temporary location before `destinationArray` is overwritten. [C++][C++] 此方法等效于标准的 C/c + + 函数`memmove`，而不`memcpy`。This method is equivalent to the standard C/C++ function `memmove`, not `memcpy`. 数组可以是引用类型数组或值类型数组。The arrays can be reference-type arrays or value-type arrays. 执行类型向下转换，则所需的方式。Type downcasting is performed, as required. - 当从引用类型数组复制到值类型数组，每个元素是取消装箱，然后将其复制。When copying from a reference-type array to a value-type array, each element is unboxed and then copied. 当从值类型数组复制到引用类型数组，每个元素被装箱，然后将其复制。When copying from a value-type array to a reference-type array, each element is boxed and then copied. - 将引用类型或值类型阵列分区到从复制时数组，创建用来保存每个值或引用，然后将其复制。When copying from a reference-type or value-type array to an array, an is created to hold each value or reference and then copied. 从复制时阵列分区到引用类型或值类型数组，以及赋值不能，引发。When copying from an array to a reference-type or value-type array and the assignment is not possible, an is thrown. - 如果`sourceArray`并`destinationArray`这两个引用类型数组或类型的两个数组，执行浅表副本。If `sourceArray` and `destinationArray` are both reference-type arrays or are both arrays of type , a shallow copy is performed. 浅表副本是一种新包含对原始与相同的元素的引用。A shallow copy of an is a new containing references to the same elements as the original . 元素本身或任何引用的元素不会复制。The elements themselves or anything referenced by the elements are not copied. 与此相反的深层副本复制元素和直接或间接引用的元素的所有内容。In contrast, a deep copy of an copies the elements and everything directly or indirectly referenced by the elements. 不兼容的类型的数组时引发。An is thrown if the arrays are of incompatible types. 类型兼容性定义，如下所示：Type compatibility is defined as follows: - 一种类型适用于自身。A type is compatible with itself. - 值类型是与兼容和由该值类型实现的接口类型。A value type is compatible with and with an interface type implemented by that value type. 仅当它实现该接口直接连接到接口视为值类型。A value type is considered connected to an interface only if it implements that interface directly. 断开连接的类型不兼容。Disconnected types are not compatible. - 两个内部函数 （预定义的） 的值类型都兼容，如果将源类型从复制到目标类型是一个扩大转换。Two intrinsic (predefined) value types are compatible if copying from the source type to the destination type is a widening conversion. 扩大转换永远不会丢失信息，而收缩转换可能会丢失信息。A widening conversion never loses information, whereas a narrowing conversion can lose information. 例如，将 32 位有符号的整数转换为 64 位有符号整数是扩大转换，并将 64 位有符号的整数转换为 32 位有符号整数都是收缩转换。For example, converting a 32-bit signed integer to a 64-bit signed integer is a widening conversion, and converting a 64-bit signed integer to a 32-bit signed integer is a narrowing conversion. 有关转换的详细信息，请参阅。For more information about conversions, see . - 内部 （用户定义） 的值类型是本身仅与兼容。A nonintrinsic (user-defined) value type is compatible only with itself. - 枚举具有隐式转换为和为其基础类型。Enumerations have an implicit conversion to and to their underlying type. 如果在每个元素`sourceArray`需要向下转换 （例如，从基类到派生类或接口的对象） 和一个或多个元素不能强制转换为相应的类型`destinationArray`、引发。If every element in `sourceArray` requires a downcast (for example, from a base class to a derived class or from an interface to an object) and one or more elements cannot be cast to the corresponding type in `destinationArray`, an is thrown. 如果此方法将引发异常时复制的状态`destinationArray`是不确定的。If this method throws an exception while copying, the state of `destinationArray` is undefined. 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是`length`。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is `length`.

summary.span: 复制 中的一系列元素（从指定的源索引开始），并将它们粘贴到另一 中（从指定的目标索引开始）。

span.span: Copies a range of elements from an starting at the specified source index and pastes them to another starting at the specified destination index.

summary.span: 长度和索引指定为 64 位整数。

span.span: The length and the indexes are specified as 64-bit integers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `sourceArray`和`destinationArray`参数必须具有相同数量的维度。The `sourceArray` and `destinationArray` parameters must have the same number of dimensions. 此外，`destinationArray`必须已具有已确定了维度，并且必须具有足够数量的元素从开始`destinationIndex`位置以容纳所复制的数据。In addition, `destinationArray` must already have been dimensioned and must have a sufficient number of elements starting from the `destinationIndex` position to accommodate the copied data. 多维数组之间复制时，该数组行为类似于长时间一维数组，其中的行 （或列） 从概念上讲列出了端到端。When copying between multidimensional arrays, the array behaves like a long one-dimensional array, where the rows (or columns) are conceptually laid end-to-end. 例如，如果数组具有三个行 （或列） 包含四个元素从一开始的数组的每个复制六个元素会将复制所有四个元素的第一行 （或列） 和第二个行 （或列） 的前两个元素。For example, if an array has three rows (or columns) with four elements each, copying six elements from the beginning of the array would copy all four elements of the first row (or column) and the first two elements of the second row (or column). 第三个行 （或列），第二个元素从其开始复制`sourceIndex`必须是第一个行 （或列） 的上限加上第二个行 （或列） 的长度再加上 2。To start copying from the second element of the third row (or column), `sourceIndex` must be the upper bound of the first row (or column) plus the length of the second row (or column) plus two. 如果`sourceArray`并`destinationArray`重叠，此方法的行为像的原始值`sourceArray`在前一个临时位置保留`destinationArray`将被覆盖。If `sourceArray` and `destinationArray` overlap, this method behaves as if the original values of `sourceArray` were preserved in a temporary location before `destinationArray` is overwritten. [C++][C++] 此方法等效于标准的 C/c + + 函数`memmove`，而不`memcpy`。This method is equivalent to the standard C/C++ function `memmove`, not `memcpy`. 数组可以是引用类型数组或值类型数组。The arrays can be reference-type arrays or value-type arrays. 执行类型向下转换，则所需的方式。Type downcasting is performed, as required. - 当从引用类型数组复制到值类型数组，每个元素是取消装箱，然后将其复制。When copying from a reference-type array to a value-type array, each element is unboxed and then copied. 当从值类型数组复制到引用类型数组，每个元素被装箱，然后将其复制。When copying from a value-type array to a reference-type array, each element is boxed and then copied. - 将引用类型或值类型阵列分区到从复制时数组，创建用来保存每个值或引用，然后将其复制。When copying from a reference-type or value-type array to an array, an is created to hold each value or reference and then copied. 从复制时阵列分区到引用类型或值类型数组，以及赋值不能，引发。When copying from an array to a reference-type or value-type array and the assignment is not possible, an is thrown. - 如果`sourceArray`并`destinationArray`这两个引用类型数组或类型的两个数组，执行浅表副本。If `sourceArray` and `destinationArray` are both reference-type arrays or are both arrays of type , a shallow copy is performed. 浅表副本是一种新包含对原始与相同的元素的引用。A shallow copy of an is a new containing references to the same elements as the original . 元素本身或任何引用的元素不会复制。The elements themselves or anything referenced by the elements are not copied. 与此相反的深层副本复制元素和直接或间接引用的元素的所有内容。In contrast, a deep copy of an copies the elements and everything directly or indirectly referenced by the elements. 不兼容的类型的数组时引发。An is thrown if the arrays are of incompatible types. 类型兼容性定义，如下所示：Type compatibility is defined as follows: - 一种类型适用于自身。A type is compatible with itself. - 值类型是与兼容和由该值类型实现的接口类型。A value type is compatible with and with an interface type implemented by that value type. 仅当它实现该接口直接连接到接口视为值类型。A value type is considered connected to an interface only if it implements that interface directly. 断开连接的类型不兼容。Disconnected types are not compatible. - 两个内部函数 （预定义的） 的值类型都兼容，如果将源类型从复制到目标类型是一个扩大转换。Two intrinsic (predefined) value types are compatible if copying from the source type to the destination type is a widening conversion. 扩大转换永远不会丢失信息，而收缩转换可能会丢失信息。A widening conversion never loses information, whereas a narrowing conversion can lose information. 例如，将 32 位有符号的整数转换为 64 位有符号整数是扩大转换，并将 64 位有符号的整数转换为 32 位有符号整数都是收缩转换。For example, converting a 32-bit signed integer to a 64-bit signed integer is a widening conversion, and converting a 64-bit signed integer to a 32-bit signed integer is a narrowing conversion. 有关转换的详细信息，请参阅。For more information about conversions, see . - 内部 （用户定义） 的值类型是本身仅与兼容。A nonintrinsic (user-defined) value type is compatible only with itself. - 枚举具有隐式转换为和为其基础类型。Enumerations have an implicit conversion to and to their underlying type. 如果在每个元素`sourceArray`需要向下转换 （例如，从基类到派生类或接口的对象） 和一个或多个元素不能强制转换为相应的类型`destinationArray`、引发。If every element in `sourceArray` requires a downcast (for example, from a base class to a derived class or from an interface to an object) and one or more elements cannot be cast to the corresponding type in `destinationArray`, an is thrown. 如果此方法将引发异常时复制的状态`destinationArray`是不确定的。If this method throws an exception while copying, the state of `destinationArray` is undefined. 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是`length`。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is `length`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从一个将复制类型的到另一个的整数类型。The following code example shows how to copy from one of type to another of type integer. [!code-cpp[Classic Array.Copy1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Array.Copy1 Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Array.Copy1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Array.Copy1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Array.Copy1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Array.Copy1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法会复制到当前数组实例的所有元素`array`目标数组，从索引处开始`index`。This method copies all the elements of the current array instance to the `array` destination array, starting at index `index`. `array`目标数组必须已具有已确定了维度，并且必须具有足够数量的元素，以便复制的元素。The `array` destination array must already have been dimensioned and must have a sufficient number of elements to accommodate the copied elements. 否则，该方法将引发异常。Otherwise, the method throws an exception. 此方法支持接口。This method supports the interface. 如果实现是不明确需要，使用以避免额外的间接寻址。If implementing is not explicitly required, use to avoid an extra indirection. 如果此方法将引发异常时复制的状态`array`是不确定的。If this method throws an exception while copying, the state of `array` is undefined. 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是。它执行的浅表副本。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is .It performs a shallow copy only. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将复制到另一个。The following code example shows how to copy an to another . [!code-cpp[Classic Array.CopyTo Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Array.CopyTo Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Array.CopyTo Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Array.CopyTo Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Array.CopyTo Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Array.CopyTo Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何将复制到另一个非零值的下限。The following code example shows how to copy an to another with a nonzero lower bound. 请注意，整个源包括覆盖目标中的现有元素的空元素的复制。Note that the entire source is copied, including empty elements that overwrite existing elements in the target . remarks.format: ## Remarks 是返回的方法的委托`true`如果该对象传递给委托中定义的条件匹配。The is a delegate to a method that returns `true` if the object passed to it matches the conditions defined in the delegate. 元素`array`逐个传递给，并找到匹配项时停止处理。The elements of `array` are individually passed to the , and processing is stopped when a match is found. > [!NOTE] > 在 C# 和 Visual Basic 中，它不需要创建显式委托。In C# and Visual Basic, it is not necessary to create the delegate explicitly. 这些语言推断从上下文正确的委托，并自动创建。These languages infer the correct delegate from context and create it automatically. 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是的`array`。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the of `array`. ## Examples 下面的示例指定的匹配条件方法 usinglambda 表达式，以检查是否全球以给定字母开头或全球是否位于给定的数组。The following example specifies the match conditions for the method usinglambda expressions to check whether a planet starts with a given letter or whether the planet is found on the given array. [!code-csharp[System.Array.Exists#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.array.exists/cs/exists3.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Array.Exists#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.array.exists/vb/exists3.vb#3)] 下面的示例使用方法，以指示是否使用指定的字符开始的字符串数组中的任何名称。The following example uses the method to indicate whether any names in a string array begin with a specified character. 该示例实例化`StringSearcher`通过传递给其类构造函数搜索的字符串对象。The example instantiates a `StringSearcher` object by passing the string to search for to its class constructor. `StringSearcher.StartsWith`方法具有相同的签名委托。The `StringSearcher.StartsWith` method has same signature as the delegate. 当方法调用，直到它返回数组的每个成员传递给委托`true`或循环访问数组中的所有元素。When the method is called, each member of the array is passed to the delegate until it returns `true` or iterates all the elements in the array. [!code-csharp[System.Array.Exists#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.array.exists/cs/exists1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Array.Exists#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.array.exists/vb/exists1.vb#1)] 可以使用 lambda 表达式，而不是显式定义的委托的签名是相对应的方法。You can also use a lambda expression rather than explicitly define a method whose signature corresponds to that of the delegate. 下面的示例将替换`StringSearcher`类并将其`StartsWith`方法使用 lambda 表达式。The following example replaces the `StringSearcher` class and its `StartsWith` method with a lambda expression. [!code-csharp[System.Array.Exists#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.array.exists/cs/exists2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Array.Exists#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.array.exists/vb/exists2.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一种方法或 lambda 表达式返回的委托`true`如果该对象传递给委托或 lambda 表达式中定义的条件匹配。The is a delegate to a method or a lambda expression that returns `true` if the object passed to it matches the conditions defined in the delegate or lambda expression. 元素`array`逐个传递给，从第一个元素开始和结束的最后一个元素。The elements of `array` are individually passed to the , starting with the first element and ending with the last element. 当找到匹配项时，停止处理。Processing is stopped when a match is found. 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是的`array`。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the of `array`. ## Examples 下面的示例使用委托，其泛型方法搜索的数组结构。The following example uses a delegate with the generic method to search an array of structures. 表示委托，该方法`ProductGT10`，返回`true`是否大于 100,000 的 X 和 Y 字段。The method the delegate represents, `ProductGT10`, returns `true` if the product of the X and Y fields is greater than 100,000. 方法返回满足测试条件的第一个点的数组的每个元素调用的代理。The method calls the delegate for each element of the array, returning the first point that meets the test condition. > [!NOTE] > Visual Basic 和 C# 用户不需要显式创建委托，或者指定泛型方法的类型参数。Visual Basic and C# users do not have to create the delegate explicitly or specify the type argument of the generic method. 编译器确定从提供的方法参数所需的类型。The compilers determine the necessary types from the method arguments you supply. [!code-csharp[System.Array.Find#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.array.find/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Array.Find#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.array.find/vb/source.vb#1)] 而不是显式定义具有必需签名的方法实例化委派，并将传递到委托方法，惯例做法是使用 lambda 表达式。Rather than explicitly defining a method with the necessary signature, instantiating a delegate, and passing the delegate to the method, it is customary to use a lambda expression. 下面的示例是与前一个相同，只不过它使用 lambda 表达式作为`match`参数。The following example is identical to the previous one, except that it uses a lambda expression as the `match` argument. [!code-csharp[System.Array.Find#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.array.find/cs/lambda.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Array.Find#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.array.find/vb/lambda.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是返回的方法的委托`true`如果该对象传递给委托中定义的条件匹配。The is a delegate to a method that returns `true` if the object passed to it matches the conditions defined in the delegate. 元素`array`逐个传递给，并在返回的数组保存的条件相匹配的元素。The elements of `array` are individually passed to the , and the elements that match the conditions are saved in the returned array. 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是的`array`。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the of `array`. ## Examples 下面的示例使用范围可以介于 0 到 1000 的值创建 50 个随机数字的数组。The following example creates an array of 50 random numbers with values that can range from 0 to 1,000. 然后，它调用方法使用 lambda 表达式的返回值，范围从 300 到 600。It then calls the method with a lambda expression that returns the values that range from 300 to 600. 请注意，lambda 表达式传递名为的参数`x`; 这表示传递到的单个数组成员。Note that the lambda expression is passed a parameter named `x`; this represents the individual array member that is passed to the . 另请注意，本地`lBound`和`uBound`变量是可在 lambda 表达式中访问。Also note that the local `lBound` and `uBound` variables are accessible within the lambda expression. [!code-csharp[System.Array.FindAll#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.array.findall/cs/findall.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Array.FindAll#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.array.findall/vb/findall.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示， ，和泛型方法。The following code example demonstrates the , , and generic methods. 创建一个字符串数组，其中包含 8 恐龙名称，其中 （位于位置 1 和 5） 两个以"saurus"结尾。An array of strings is created, containing 8 dinosaur names, two of which (at positions 1 and 5) end with "saurus". 该代码示例还定义一个名为搜索谓词的方法`EndsWithSaurus`、，它接受字符串参数和返回一个布尔值，该值指示是否以"saurus"结尾的输入的字符串。The code example also defines a search predicate method named `EndsWithSaurus`, which accepts a string parameter and returns a Boolean value indicating whether the input string ends in "saurus". 泛型方法开始时，将每个元素传递给又从遍历数组`EndsWithSaurus`方法。The generic method traverses the array from the beginning, passing each element in turn to the `EndsWithSaurus` method. 搜索将停止何时`EndsWithSaurus`方法将返回`true`"Amargasaurus"的元素。The search stops when the `EndsWithSaurus` method returns `true` for the element "Amargasaurus". > [!NOTE] > 在 C# 和 Visual Basic 中，它不需要创建`Predicate`委托 (`Predicate(Of String)`在 Visual Basic 中) 显式。In C# and Visual Basic, it is not necessary to create the `Predicate` delegate (`Predicate(Of String)` in Visual Basic) explicitly. 这些语言推断从上下文正确的委托，并自动创建。These languages infer the correct delegate from context and create it automatically. 泛型方法用于搜索向后端的数组。The generic method is used to search the array backward from the end. 它找到的元素"Dilophosaurus"在位置 5。It finds the element "Dilophosaurus" at position 5. 泛型方法用于返回包含以"saurus"结尾的所有元素的数组。The generic method is used to return an array containing all the elements that end in "saurus". 元素的显示。The elements are displayed. 代码示例还演示和泛型方法。The code example also demonstrates the and generic methods. [!code-cpp[Array_FindEtAl#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Array_FindEtAl/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Array_FindEtAl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Array_FindEtAl/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Array_FindEtAl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Array_FindEtAl/vb/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 向前的第一个元素开始和结束时间的最后一个元素搜索。The is searched forward starting at the first element and ending at the last element. 是返回的方法的委托`true`如果该对象传递给委托中定义的条件匹配。The is a delegate to a method that returns `true` if the object passed to it matches the conditions defined in the delegate. 元素`array`逐个传递给。The elements of `array` are individually passed to the . 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是的`array`。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the of `array`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示的所有三个重载泛型方法。The following code example demonstrates all three overloads of the generic method. 创建一个字符串数组，其中包含 8 恐龙名称，其中 （位于位置 1 和 5） 两个以"saurus"结尾。An array of strings is created, containing 8 dinosaur names, two of which (at positions 1 and 5) end with "saurus". 该代码示例还定义一个名为搜索谓词的方法`EndsWithSaurus`、，它接受字符串参数和返回一个布尔值，该值指示是否以"saurus"结尾的输入的字符串。The code example also defines a search predicate method named `EndsWithSaurus`, which accepts a string parameter and returns a Boolean value indicating whether the input string ends in "saurus". 方法重载从开始时，将每个元素传递给反过来遍历数组`EndsWithSaurus`方法。The method overload traverses the array from the beginning, passing each element in turn to the `EndsWithSaurus` method. 搜索将停止何时`EndsWithSaurus`方法将返回`true`位于位置 1 处的元素。The search stops when the `EndsWithSaurus` method returns `true` for the element at position 1. > [!NOTE] > 在 C# 和 Visual Basic 中，它不需要创建`Predicate`委托 (`Predicate(Of String)`在 Visual Basic 中) 显式。In C# and Visual Basic, it is not necessary to create the `Predicate` delegate (`Predicate(Of String)` in Visual Basic) explicitly. 这些语言推断从上下文正确的委托，并自动创建。These languages infer the correct delegate from context and create it automatically. 方法重载用于搜索位置 2 开始，一直到数组末尾的数组。The method overload is used to search the array beginning at position 2 and continuing to the end of the array. 它查找位置 5 处的元素。It finds the element at position 5. 最后，方法重载用于搜索的位置 2 开始的三个元素的范围。Finally, the method overload is used to search the range of three elements beginning at position 2. 因为在该范围内没有以"saurus"结尾的恐龙名称，则返回 – 1。It returns –1 because there are no dinosaur names in that range that end with "saurus". remarks.format: ## Remarks 处开始向前搜索`startIndex`和结束时间的最后一个元素。The is searched forward starting at `startIndex` and ending at the last element. 是返回的方法的委托`true`如果该对象传递给委托中定义的条件匹配。The is a delegate to a method that returns `true` if the object passed to it matches the conditions defined in the delegate. 元素`array`逐个传递给。The elements of `array` are individually passed to the . 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是中的元素数目`startIndex`到末尾`array`。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the number of elements from `startIndex` to the end of `array`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示的所有三个重载泛型方法。The following code example demonstrates all three overloads of the generic method. 创建一个字符串数组，其中包含 8 恐龙名称，其中 （位于位置 1 和 5） 两个以"saurus"结尾。An array of strings is created, containing 8 dinosaur names, two of which (at positions 1 and 5) end with "saurus". 该代码示例还定义一个名为搜索谓词的方法`EndsWithSaurus`、，它接受字符串参数和返回一个布尔值，该值指示是否以"saurus"结尾的输入的字符串。The code example also defines a search predicate method named `EndsWithSaurus`, which accepts a string parameter and returns a Boolean value indicating whether the input string ends in "saurus". 方法重载从开始时，将每个元素传递给反过来遍历数组`EndsWithSaurus`方法。The method overload traverses the array from the beginning, passing each element in turn to the `EndsWithSaurus` method. 搜索将停止何时`EndsWithSaurus`方法将返回`true`位于位置 1 处的元素。The search stops when the `EndsWithSaurus` method returns `true` for the element at position 1. > [!NOTE] > 在 C# 和 Visual Basic 中，它不需要创建`Predicate`委托 (`Predicate(Of String)`在 Visual Basic 中) 显式。In C# and Visual Basic, it is not necessary to create the `Predicate` delegate (`Predicate(Of String)` in Visual Basic) explicitly. 这些语言推断从上下文正确的委托，并自动创建。These languages infer the correct delegate from context and create it automatically. 方法重载用于搜索位置 2 开始，一直到数组末尾的数组。The method overload is used to search the array beginning at position 2 and continuing to the end of the array. 它查找位置 5 处的元素。It finds the element at position 5. 最后，方法重载用于搜索的位置 2 开始的三个元素的范围。Finally, the method overload is used to search the range of three elements beginning at position 2. 因为在该范围内没有以"saurus"结尾的恐龙名称，则返回 – 1。It returns –1 because there are no dinosaur names in that range that end with "saurus". remarks.format: ## Remarks [Visual Basic、 C#][Visual Basic, C#] `foreach` C# 语言的语句 (`for each` c + + 中`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中) 隐藏了枚举器的复杂性。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in C++, `For Each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建议使用 `foreach`，而不是直接操作枚举数。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 枚举器可用于读取集合中的数据，但不能用于修改基础集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 最初，枚举数定位在集合中第一个元素的前面。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 也会将枚举器放回此位置。 also brings the enumerator back to this position. 在此位置上，未定义 。At this position, is undefined. 因此，在读取 的值之前，必须调用 将枚举器向前移动到集合的第一个元素。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 在调用 或 之前， 返回同一对象。 returns the same object until either or is called. 将 设置为下一个元素。 sets to the next element. 如果越过集合，枚举器的末尾放置在集合中的最后一个元素的后面和返回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 当枚举数位于此位置上，对后续调用还返回`false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果最后一次调用到返回`false`，是不确定的。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 若要再次将 设置为集合的第一个元素，可以调用 并接着调用 。To set to the first element of the collection again, you can call followed by . 只要集合保持不变，枚举数就保持有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果对集合进行更改（如添加、修改或删除元素），则枚举数将失效且不可恢复，而且其行为是不确定的。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and its behavior is undefined. 该枚举数不具有独占访问集合的权限；因此，枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要允许多个线程访问集合以进行读写操作，则必须实现自己的同步。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 此方法为 o （1） 运算。This method is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用列出数组的元素。The following code example shows how to use to list the elements of an array. remarks.format: ## Remarks `GetLowerBound(0)` 返回数组的第一个维的起始索引和`GetLowerBound(Rank - 1)`返回最后一个维度的数组的起始索引。`GetLowerBound(0)` returns the starting index of the first dimension of the array, and `GetLowerBound(Rank - 1)` returns the starting index of the last dimension of the array. 方法始终返回一个值，指示该数组的下限绑定的索引，即使数组为空。The method always returns a value that indicates the index of the lower bound of the array, even if the array is empty. 请注意，尽管.NET Framework 中的大多数数组是从零开始 (即，方法返回一个数组的每个维度的零)，.NET Framework 支持不从零开始的数组。Note that, although most arrays in the .NET Framework are zero-based (that is, the method returns zero for each dimension of an array), the .NET Framework does support arrays that are not zero-based. 可用于创建此类数组方法，并且还可以从非托管代码返回。Such arrays can be created with the method, and can also be returned from unmanaged code. 此方法为 o （1） 运算。This method is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的示例使用和方法来显示一维和二维数组的界限并显示其数组元素的值。The following example uses the and methods to display the bounds of a one-dimensional and two-dimensional array and to display the values of their array elements. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法搜索的一维 arrayfor 的所有元素`value`。This method searches all the elements of a one-dimensional arrayfor `value`. 若要确定是否`value`中存在`array`，该方法通过调用每个元素执行相等比较`Equals`方法，直到它找到的匹配项。To determine whether `value` exists in `array`, the method performs an equality comparison by calling each element's `Equals` method until it finds a match. 这意味着，如果元素会替代方法，调用该重写。This means that if the element overrides the method, that override is called. 由于大多数数组下限为零，此方法通常返回 – 1 如果`value`找不到。Because most arrays have a lower bound of zero, this method generally returns –1 if`value` isn’t found. 在极少数情况下，它等于数组的下限(0x80000000) 和`value`找不到，此方法返回(0x7FFFFFFF)。In the rare case that the lower bound of the array is equal to (0x80000000) and `value` isn’t found, this method returns (0x7FFFFFFF). 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是的`array`。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the of `array`. ## Examples 该示例将调用的以下三个重载方法以字符串数组中查找字符串的索引：The example calls the following three overloads of the method to find the index of a string in a string array: - 以确定第一次出现的字符串"the"中的字符串数组。, to determine the first occurrence of the string "the" in a string array. - 以确定第一次出现的字符串"the"中的字符串数组的最后一个元素到第四个。, to determine the first occurrence of the string "the" in the fourth to the last elements of a string array. - 以确定第一次出现的字符串"the"在字符串中数组从追踪到数组末尾的最后一个成功匹配的元素。, to determine the first occurrence of the string "the" in a string array from the element that follows the last successful match to the end of the array. span.span: Searches for the specified object and returns the index of its first occurrence in a one-dimensional array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法搜索的一维数组的所有元素`value`。This method searches all the elements of a one-dimensional array for `value`. 若要确定是否`value`中存在`array`，该方法通过调用执行相等比较`T.Equals`上的每个元素的方法。To determine whether `value` exists in `array`, the method performs an equality comparison by calling the `T.Equals` method on every element. 这意味着，如果`T`重写方法，调用该重写。This means that if `T` overrides the method, that override is called. 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是的`array`。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the of `array`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示的所有三个泛型重载方法。The following example demonstrates all three generic overloads of the method. 创建一个字符串数组，其中有两次，出现在索引位置 0 和 5 的索引位置的一项。An array of strings is created, with one entry that appears twice, at index location 0 and index location 5. 方法重载从一开始，数组中搜索并查找字符串的第一个匹配项。The method overload searches the array from the beginning, and finds the first occurrence of the string. 方法重载用于搜索的索引位置 3 开头的数组，一直到数组末尾并查找字符串的第二个匹配项。The method overload is used to search the array beginning with index location 3 and continuing to the end of the array, and finds the second occurrence of the string. 最后，方法重载用于搜索的两个条目，开始的索引位置两个范围，则返回 – 1，因为没有在该范围内搜索字符串的实例。Finally, the method overload is used to search a range of two entries, beginning at index location two; it returns –1 because there are no instances of the search string in that range. summary.span: 通过调用值类型的默认构造函数，初始化值类型 的每一个元素。

span.span: Initializes every element of the value-type by calling the default constructor of the value type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法旨在帮助编译器支持值类型数组;大多数用户不需要使用此方法。This method is designed to help compilers support value-type arrays; most users do not need this method. 它必须不能对引用类型数组。It must not be used on reference-type arrays. 如果不是值类型或值类型不具有默认构造函数，如果则不会修改。If the is not a value-type or if the value type does not have a default constructor, the is not modified. 值类型可以具有任何更低绑定和任意数量的维度。The value-type can have any lower bound and any number of dimensions. 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . > [!CAUTION] > 可以仅在具有构造函数; 的值类型上使用此方法但是，值类型的本机 C# 没有构造函数。You can use this method only on value types that have constructors; however, value types that are native to C# do not have constructors.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示 是否具有固定大小。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the has a fixed size.

value.span: 此属性对于所有数组总是 。

span.span: This property is always for all arrays.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现属性因为它必需的接口。 implements the property because it is required by the interface. 具有固定大小的数组不允许添加或删除的元素，该数组创建，但它允许修改现有元素后。An array with a fixed size does not allow the addition or removal of elements after the array is created, but it allows the modification of existing elements. 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the is read-only.

value.span: 此属性对于所有数组总是 。

span.span: This property is always for all arrays.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现属性因为它必需的接口。 implements the property because it is required by the interface. 之后该数组创建数组，它是只读的不允许添加、 移除或修改元素。An array that is read-only does not allow the addition, removal, or modification of elements after the array is created. 如果需要只读集合，使用类，该类实现接口。If you require a read-only collection, use a class that implements the interface. 如果强制转换或转换到的数组接口对象属性返回`false`。If you cast or convert an array to an interface object, the property returns `false`. 但是，如果强制转换或转换到的数组接口，`IsReadOnly`属性返回`true`。However, if you cast or convert an array to a interface, the `IsReadOnly` property returns `true`. 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否同步对 的访问（线程安全）。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether access to the is synchronized (thread safe).

value.span: 此属性对于所有数组总是 。

span.span: This property is always for all arrays.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现属性因为它必需的接口。 implements the property because it is required by the interface. .NET framework 类基于提供集合使用其自己的同步的版本属性。.NET Framework classes based on provide their own synchronized version of the collection using the property. 使用数组的类还可实现其自己的同步使用属性。Classes that use arrays can also implement their own synchronization using the property. 同步代码必须在执行操作`SyncRoot`的不是直接对集合的集合。The synchronizing code must perform operations on the `SyncRoot` of the collection, not directly on the collection. 这样可确保对从其他对象派生的集合正确地执行操作。This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects. 具体而言，它维护与其他线程可能同时修改集合的正确同步。Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the collection. 请注意，某些实现的可能会返回本身。Note that some implementations of might return the itself. 枚举整个集合本质上不是线程安全的过程。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure. 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何通过在整个枚举期间锁定数组属性。The following code example shows how to lock an array during the entire enumeration by using the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 一维向后搜索的最后一个元素开始，结束时间的第一个元素。The one-dimensional is searched backward starting at the last element and ending at the first element. 对元素进行比较指定的值使用方法。The elements are compared to the specified value using the method. 如果元素类型是内部的 （用户定义） 类型，`Equals`使用该类型的实现。If the element type is a nonintrinsic (user-defined) type, the `Equals` implementation of that type is used. 由于大多数数组将下限为零，此方法通常将返回-1 时`value`找不到。Since most arrays will have a lower bound of zero, this method would generally return –1 when `value` is not found. 在极少数情况下，它等于数组的下限并`value`未找到，则此方法返回，这是`System.Int32.MinValue - 1`。In the rare case that the lower bound of the array is equal to and `value` is not found, this method returns , which is `System.Int32.MinValue - 1`. 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是的`array`。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the of `array`. 在.NET Framework 2.0 版中，此方法使用并方法的来确定是否指定的`value`存在的参数。In the .NET Framework version 2.0, this method uses the and methods of the to determine whether the specified by the `value` parameter exists. 在.NET Framework 的早期版本中，通过进行此判断并方法的`value`本身。In the earlier versions of the .NET Framework, this determination was made by using the and methods of the `value` itself. 方法的`item`参数在集合中的对象。 methods of the `item` parameter on the objects in the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何确定数组中指定的元素的最后一个匹配项的索引。The following code example shows how to determine the index of the last occurrence of a specified element in an array. remarks.format: ## Remarks 向后搜索的最后一个元素开始，结束时间的第一个元素。The is searched backward starting at the last element and ending at the first element. 对元素进行比较指定的值使用方法。The elements are compared to the specified value using the method. 如果元素类型是内部的 （用户定义） 类型，`Equals`使用该类型的实现。If the element type is a nonintrinsic (user-defined) type, the `Equals` implementation of that type is used. 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是的`array`。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the of `array`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示的所有三个泛型重载方法。The following code example demonstrates all three generic overloads of the method. 创建一个字符串数组，其中有两次，出现在索引位置 0 和 5 的索引位置的一项。An array of strings is created, with one entry that appears twice, at index location 0 and index location 5. 方法重载从结束时，整个数组中搜索并查找字符串的第二个匹配项。The method overload searches the entire array from the end, and finds the second occurrence of the string. 方法重载用于搜索数组索引位置 3 的向后开始，一直到该数组的开头，并查找字符串的第一个匹配项。The method overload is used to search the array backward beginning with index location 3 and continuing to the beginning of the array, and finds the first occurrence of the string. 最后，方法重载用于搜索的索引位置 4 开始，往前的四个条目范围 （即，它搜索在位置 4、 3、 2 和 1 项）; 此搜索将返回 – 1，因为没有搜索的实例在该范围内的字符串。Finally, the method overload is used to search a range of four entries, beginning at index location 4 and extending backward (that is, it searches the items at locations 4, 3, 2, and 1); this search returns –1 because there are no instances of the search string in that range. summary.span: 搜索指定的对象，并返回 中到指定索引为止包含指定个元素的这部分元素中最后一个匹配项的索引。

span.span: Searches for the specified object and returns the index of the last occurrence within the range of elements in the that contains the specified number of elements and ends at the specified index.

returns.span: 如果在 中到 为止、包含 所指定的元素个数的这部分元素中，找到 的匹配项，则为最后一个匹配项的从零开始的索引；否则为 -1。

span.span: The zero-based index of the last occurrence of within the range of elements in that contains the number of elements specified in and ends at , if found; otherwise, –1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是搜索处开始向后`startIndex`结束时间`startIndex`减去`count`加上 1，如果`count`大于 0。The is searched backward starting at `startIndex` and ending at `startIndex` minus `count` plus 1, if `count` is greater than 0. 对元素进行比较指定的值使用方法。The elements are compared to the specified value using the method. 如果元素类型是内部的 （用户定义） 类型，`Equals`使用该类型的实现。If the element type is a nonintrinsic (user-defined) type, the `Equals` implementation of that type is used. 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是`count`。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is `count`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示的所有三个泛型重载方法。The following code example demonstrates all three generic overloads of the method. 创建一个字符串数组，其中有两次，出现在索引位置 0 和 5 的索引位置的一项。An array of strings is created, with one entry that appears twice, at index location 0 and index location 5. 方法重载从结束时，整个数组中搜索并查找字符串的第二个匹配项。The method overload searches the entire array from the end, and finds the second occurrence of the string. 方法重载用于搜索数组索引位置 3 的向后开始，一直到该数组的开头，并查找字符串的第一个匹配项。The method overload is used to search the array backward beginning with index location 3 and continuing to the beginning of the array, and finds the first occurrence of the string. 最后，方法重载用于搜索的索引位置 4 开始，往前的四个条目范围 （即，它搜索在位置 4、 3、 2 和 1 项）; 此搜索将返回 – 1，因为没有搜索的实例在该范围内的字符串。Finally, the method overload is used to search a range of four entries, beginning at index location 4 and extending backward (that is, it searches the items at locations 4, 3, 2, and 1); this search returns –1 because there are no instances of the search string in that range. [!code-cpp[Array_LastIndexOf#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Array_LastIndexOf/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Array_LastIndexOf#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Array_LastIndexOf/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Array_LastIndexOf#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Array_LastIndexOf/vb/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法分配指定大小的新数组，从旧的数组的元素复制到新，然后使用新替换旧的数组。This method allocates a new array with the specified size, copies elements from the old array to the new one, and then replaces the old array with the new one. `array` 必须是一个一维数组。`array` must be a one-dimensional array. 如果`array`是`null`，此方法具有指定大小创建一个新数组。If `array` is `null`, this method creates a new array with the specified size. 如果`newSize`大于旧数组分配一个新数组和所有元素都复制到新旧的数组。If `newSize` is greater than the of the old array, a new array is allocated and all the elements are copied from the old array to the new one. 如果`newSize`是不会早于旧数组分配一个新数组和元素从旧数组复制到新直至充满新; 旧数组中的元素的其余部分将被忽略。If `newSize` is less than the of the old array, a new array is allocated and elements are copied from the old array to the new one until the new one is filled; the rest of the elements in the old array are ignored. 如果`newSize`等同于的旧的数组，此方法不执行任何操作。If `newSize` is equal to the of the old array, this method does nothing. 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是`newSize`。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is `newSize`. 方法调整大小的一维数组。The method resizes a one-dimensional array only. 类不包括调整多维数组的大小的方法。The class does not include a method for resizing multi-dimensional arrays. 若要执行此操作，必须提供你自己的代码或第三方库中调用专用方法。To do this, you must either provide your own code or call a special-purpose method in a third-party library. 以下代码演示了一种可能实现的方法的调整大小的数组*n*维度。The following code illustrates one possible implementation for a method that resizes an array of *n* dimensions. [!code-csharp[System.Array.Resize#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array.Resize/CS/resizexd.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Array.Resize#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array.Resize/VB/resizexd.vb#2)] ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何重设大小会影响数组。The following example shows how resizing affects the array. [!code-cpp[System.Array.Resize#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array.Resize/CPP/System.Array.Resize.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Array.Resize#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array.Resize/CS/arrayresize.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Array.Resize#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array.Resize/VB/arrayresize.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法，处的元素后`myArray[i]`，其中`i`是数组中的任何索引，将移至`myArray[j]`，其中`j`等于`(myArray.Length + myArray.GetLowerBound(0)) - (i - myArray.GetLowerBound(0)) - 1`。After a call to this method, the element at `myArray[i]`, where `i` is any index in the array, moves to `myArray[j]`, where `j` equals `(myArray.Length + myArray.GetLowerBound(0)) - (i - myArray.GetLowerBound(0)) - 1`. 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是的`array`。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the of `array`. 如下面的示例所示，方法可用于反向交错的数组。As the following example shows, the method can be used to reverse a jagged array. 它将每个月的当前区域性的日历中的当前年份初始化交错的数组包含一个元素。It initializes a jagged array with one element for each month of the current year in the current culture's calendar. 每个元素包含与该月有天的所有元素的数组。Each element contains an array with as many elements as that month has days. 该示例显示的内容的数组，调用方法，然后显示反向数组的内容。The example displays the contents of the array, calls the method, and then displays the contents of the reversed array. summary.span: 对一维数组中的元素进行排序。

span.span: Sorts the elements in a one-dimensional array.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void Sort (Array array);
.method public static hidebysig void Sort(class System.Array array) cil managed
public: static void Sort(Array ^ array);
static member Sort : Array -> unit

param.name: array
param.span: 要排序的一维 。

span.span: The one-dimensional to sort.

summary.span: 使用 中每个元素的 实现，对整个一维 中的元素进行排序。

span.span: Sorts the elements in an entire one-dimensional using the implementation of each element of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个元素`array`必须实现接口，才能与每个其他元素中的比较的`array`。Each element of `array` must implement the interface to be capable of comparisons with every other element in `array`. 如果排序未成功完成，则结果不确定。If the sort is not successfully completed, the results are undefined. 此方法使用内省排序 (introsort) 算法，如下所示：This method uses the introspective sort (introsort) algorithm as follows: - 如果分区大小少于 16 个元素，则使用[插入排序](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort)算法。If the partition size is fewer than 16 elements, it uses an [insertion sort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort) algorithm. - 如果分区数超过 2 \* LogN，其中*N*是范围的输入数组，它使用[Heapsort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort)算法。If the number of partitions exceeds 2 \* LogN, where *N* is the range of the input array, it uses a [Heapsort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort) algorithm. - 否则，它使用[Quicksort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort)算法。Otherwise, it uses a [Quicksort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort) algorithm. 此实现将执行不稳定排序;也就是说，如果两个元素相等，可能不会保留其顺序。This implementation performs an unstable sort; that is, if two elements are equal, their order might not be preserved. 与此相反，一个稳定排序保留相等元素的顺序。In contrast, a stable sort preserves the order of elements that are equal. 对于在最坏情况下使用 Heapsort 和快速排序算法进行排序的数组，此方法为 O (`n`日志`n`) 操作，其中`n`是的`array`。For arrays that are sorted by using the Heapsort and Quicksort algorithms, in the worst case, this method is an O(`n` log `n`) operation, where `n` is the of `array`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何对中的值进行排序使用默认比较器和将反转排序顺序的自定义比较器。The following code example shows how to sort the values in an using the default comparer and a custom comparer that reverses the sort order. 请注意，结果可能因当前。Note that the result might vary depending on the current . [!code-cpp[System.Array.Sort#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array.Sort/CPP/arraysort.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Array.Sort#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array.Sort/CS/arraysort.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Array.Sort#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array.Sort/VB/arraysort.vb#1)]

span.span: is .
is multidimensional.

static member Sort : Array * Array -> unit

param.name: keys
param.span: 一维 ，它包含要排序的关键字。

span.span: The one-dimensional that contains the keys to sort.

param.name: items
param.span: 一维 ，其中包含与 keys 中每个关键字对应的项。

span.span: The one-dimensional that contains the items that correspond to each of the keys in the keys.

param.span: -或- 如果为 ，则只对 keys 进行排序。

span.span: -or- to sort only the keys.

summary.span: 基于第一个 中的关键字，使用每个关键字的 实现，对两个一维 对象（一个包含关键字，另一个包含对应的项）进行排序。

span.span: Sorts a pair of one-dimensional objects (one contains the keys and the other contains the corresponding items) based on the keys in the first using the implementation of each key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在每个键`keys`都有对应项`items` 。Each key in the `keys` has a corresponding item in the `items`. 在排序中的相应项过程时重新定位一个键`items`同样重新定位。When a key is repositioned during the sorting, the corresponding item in the `items` is similarly repositioned. 因此， `items` 按照中的对应键的排列方式排序`keys` 。Therefore, the `items` is sorted according to the arrangement of the corresponding keys in the `keys`. 在每个键`keys`必须实现接口，才能与其他任何关键字进行比较。Each key in the `keys` must implement the interface to be capable of comparisons with every other key. 如果有更多的项比密钥，但不是进行排序有没有对应的键的项，您可以进行排序。You can sort if there are more items than keys, but the items that have no corresponding keys will not be sorted. 如果以上的项; 更多密钥不能进行排序这样做将引发。You cannot sort if there are more keys than items; doing this throws an . 如果排序未成功完成，则结果不确定。If the sort is not successfully completed, the results are undefined. 此方法使用内省排序 (introsort) 算法，如下所示：This method uses the introspective sort (introsort) algorithm as follows: - 如果分区大小少于 16 个元素，则使用[插入排序](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort)算法。If the partition size is fewer than 16 elements, it uses an [insertion sort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort) algorithm. - 如果分区数超过 2 \* LogN，其中*N*是范围的输入数组，它使用[Heapsort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort)算法。If the number of partitions exceeds 2 \* LogN, where *N* is the range of the input array, it uses a [Heapsort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort) algorithm. - 否则，它使用[Quicksort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort)算法。Otherwise, it uses a [Quicksort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort) algorithm. 此实现将执行不稳定排序;也就是说，如果两个元素相等，可能不会保留其顺序。This implementation performs an unstable sort; that is, if two elements are equal, their order might not be preserved. 与此相反，一个稳定排序保留相等元素的顺序。In contrast, a stable sort preserves the order of elements that are equal. 对于在最坏情况下使用 Heapsort 和快速排序算法进行排序的数组，此方法为 O (`n`日志`n`) 操作，其中`n`是的`keys`。For arrays that are sorted by using the Heapsort and Quicksort algorithms, in the worst case, this method is an O(`n` log `n`) operation, where `n` is the of `keys`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何对两个关联的数组，其中第一个数组包含关键字，第二个数组包含的值进行排序。The following example shows how to sort two associated arrays where the first array contains the keys and the second array contains the values. 完成排序使用的默认比较器和将反转排序顺序的自定义比较器。Sorts are done using the default comparer and a custom comparer that reverses the sort order. 请注意，结果可能因当前。Note that the result might vary depending on the current . remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`comparer`是`null`，每个元素的`array`必须实现接口，才能与每个其他元素中的比较的`array`。If `comparer` is `null`, each element of `array` must implement the interface to be capable of comparisons with every other element in `array`. 如果排序未成功完成，则结果不确定。If the sort is not successfully completed, the results are undefined. 此方法使用内省排序 (introsort) 算法，如下所示：This method uses the introspective sort (introsort) algorithm as follows: - 如果分区大小少于 16 个元素，则使用[插入排序](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort)算法。If the partition size is fewer than 16 elements, it uses an [insertion sort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort) algorithm. - 如果分区数超过 2 \* LogN，其中*N*是范围的输入数组，它使用[Heapsort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort)算法。If the number of partitions exceeds 2 \* LogN, where *N* is the range of the input array, it uses a [Heapsort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort) algorithm. - 否则，它使用[Quicksort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort)算法。Otherwise, it uses a [Quicksort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort) algorithm. 此实现将执行不稳定排序;也就是说，如果两个元素相等，可能不会保留其顺序。This implementation performs an unstable sort; that is, if two elements are equal, their order might not be preserved. 与此相反，一个稳定排序保留相等元素的顺序。In contrast, a stable sort preserves the order of elements that are equal. 对于在最坏情况下使用 Heapsort 和快速排序算法进行排序的数组，此方法为 O (`n`日志`n`) 操作，其中`n`是的`array`。For arrays that are sorted by using the Heapsort and Quicksort algorithms, in the worst case, this method is an O(`n` log `n`) operation, where `n` is the of `array`. .NET Framework 包括预定义下表中列出的实现。The .NET Framework includes predefined implementations listed in the following table. |实现Implementation|描述Description| |--------------------|-----------------| ||比较任何两个对象，但执行不区分大小写的字符串比较。Compares any two objects, but performs a case-insensitive comparison of strings.| ||使用当前区域性的排序约定比较任何两个对象。Compares any two objects by using the sorting conventions of the current culture.| ||使用固定区域性的排序约定比较任何两个对象。Compares any two objects by using the sorting conventions of the invariant culture.| ||比较两个对象类型的`T`使用该类型的默认排序顺序。Compares two objects of type `T` by using the type's default sort order.| 此外可以通过提供你自己的实例来支持自定义比较实现`comparer`参数。You can also support custom comparisons by providing an instance of your own implementation to the `comparer` parameter. 该示例通过定义来执行此`ReverseComparer`反转的默认排序顺序的类类型的实例和执行不区分大小写的字符串比较。The example does this by defining a `ReverseComparer` class that reverses the default sort order for instances of a type and performs case-insensitive string comparison. ## Examples 下面的示例对使用默认比较器字符串 arrayby 中的值进行排序。The following example sorts the values in a string arrayby using the default comparer. 它还定义一个自定义实现名为`ReverseComparer`的执行不区分大小写的字符串比较时反转对象的默认排序顺序。It also defines a custom implementation named `ReverseComparer` that reverses an object's default sort order while performing a case-insensitive string comparison. 请注意，输出可能会有所不同，具体取决于当前区域性。Note that the output might vary depending on the current culture. span.para: .NET Framework 4 和更早版本使用仅快速排序算法。快速排序标识无效的比较器在某些情况下，在排序操作将引发异常，并且会引发给调用方的异常。从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，就可以，以前排序操作引发了不会引发异常，因为插入排序和 heapsort 算法不检测无效的比较器。大多数情况下，这适用于具有少于 16 个元素的数组。

The .NET Framework 4 and earlier versions used only the Quicksort algorithm. Quicksort identifies invalid comparers in some situations in which the sorting operation throws an exception, and throws an exception to the caller. Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], it is possible that sorting operations that previously threw will not throw an exception, because the insertion sort and heapsort algorithms do not detect an invalid comparer. For the most part, this applies to arrays with fewer than 16 elements.
