that is, if two elements are equal, their order might not be preserved. 与此相反，一个稳定排序保留相等元素的顺序。In contrast, a stable sort preserves the order of elements that are equal. 对于在最坏情况下使用 Heapsort 和快速排序算法进行排序的数组，此方法为 O (`n`日志`n`) 操作，其中`n`是的`keys`。For arrays that are sorted by using the Heapsort and Quicksort algorithms, in the worst case, this method is an O(`n` log `n`) operation, where `n` is the of `keys`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何对两个关联的数组，其中第一个数组包含关键字，第二个数组包含的值进行排序。The following example shows how to sort two associated arrays where the first array contains the keys and the second array contains the values. 完成排序使用的默认比较器和将反转排序顺序的自定义比较器。Sorts are done using the default comparer and a custom comparer that reverses the sort order. 请注意，结果可能因当前。Note that the result might vary depending on the current . remarks.format: ## Remarks 在每个键`keys`都有对应项`items` 。Each key in the `keys` has a corresponding item in the `items`. 在排序中的相应项过程时重新定位一个键`items`同样重新定位。When a key is repositioned during the sorting, the corresponding item in the `items` is similarly repositioned. 因此， `items` 按照中的对应键的排列方式排序`keys` 。Therefore, the `items` is sorted according to the arrangement of the corresponding keys in the `keys`. 中的元素指定的范围内的每个键`keys`必须实现接口，才能与其他任何关键字进行比较。Each key within the specified range of elements in the `keys` must implement the interface to be capable of comparisons with every other key. 如果有更多的项比密钥，但不是进行排序有没有对应的键的项，您可以进行排序。You can sort if there are more items than keys, but the items that have no corresponding keys will not be sorted. 如果以上的项; 更多密钥不能进行排序这样做将引发。You cannot sort if there are more keys than items; doing this throws an . 如果排序未成功完成，则结果不确定。If the sort is not successfully completed, the results are undefined. 此方法使用内省排序 (introsort) 算法，如下所示：This method uses the introspective sort (introsort) algorithm as follows: - 如果分区大小少于 16 个元素，则使用[插入排序](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort)算法。If the partition size is fewer than 16 elements, it uses an [insertion sort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort) algorithm. - 如果分区数超过 2 \* LogN，其中*N*是范围的输入数组，它使用[Heapsort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort)算法。If the number of partitions exceeds 2 \* LogN, where *N* is the range of the input array, it uses a [Heapsort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort) algorithm. - 否则，它使用[Quicksort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort)算法。Otherwise, it uses a [Quicksort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort) algorithm. 此实现将执行不稳定排序;也就是说，如果两个元素相等，可能不会保留其顺序。This implementation performs an unstable sort; that is, if two elements are equal, their order might not be preserved. 与此相反，一个稳定排序保留相等元素的顺序。In contrast, a stable sort preserves the order of elements that are equal. 对于在最坏情况下使用 Heapsort 和快速排序算法进行排序的数组，此方法为 O (`n`日志`n`) 操作，其中`n`是`length`。For arrays that are sorted by using the Heapsort and Quicksort algorithms, in the worst case, this method is an O(`n` log `n`) operation, where `n` is `length`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何对两个关联的数组，其中第一个数组包含关键字，第二个数组包含的值进行排序。The following code example shows how to sort two associated arrays where the first array contains the keys and the second array contains the values. 完成排序使用的默认比较器和将反转排序顺序的自定义比较器。Sorts are done using the default comparer and a custom comparer that reverses the sort order. 请注意，结果可能因当前。Note that the result might vary depending on the current . [!code-cpp[System.Array.Sort2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array.Sort2/CPP/arraysort2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Array.Sort2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array.Sort2/CS/arraysort2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Array.Sort2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array.Sort2/VB/arraysort2.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`comparer`是`null`，每个元素中的元素指定的范围内`array`必须实现接口，才能与每个其他元素中的比较的`array`。If `comparer` is `null`, each element within the specified range of elements in `array` must implement the interface to be capable of comparisons with every other element in `array`. 如果排序未成功完成，则结果不确定。If the sort is not successfully completed, the results are undefined. .NET Framework 包括预定义下表中列出的实现。The .NET Framework includes predefined implementations listed in the following table. |实现Implementation|描述Description| |--------------------|-----------------| ||比较任何两个对象，但执行不区分大小写的字符串比较。Compares any two objects, but performs a case-insensitive comparison of strings.| ||使用当前区域性的排序约定比较任何两个对象。Compares any two objects by using the sorting conventions of the current culture.| ||使用固定区域性的排序约定比较任何两个对象。Compares any two objects by using the sorting conventions of the invariant culture.| ||比较两个对象类型的`T`使用该类型的默认排序顺序。Compares two objects of type `T` by using the type's default sort order.| 此外可以通过提供你自己的实例来支持自定义比较实现`comparer`参数。You can also support custom comparisons by providing an instance of your own implementation to the `comparer` parameter. 该示例通过定义来执行此`ReverseComparer`反转的默认排序顺序的类类型的实例和执行不区分大小写的字符串比较。The example does this by defining a `ReverseComparer` class that reverses the default sort order for instances of a type and performs case-insensitive string comparison. 此方法使用内省排序 (introsort) 算法，如下所示：This method uses the introspective sort (introsort) algorithm as follows: - 如果分区大小少于 16 个元素，则使用[插入排序](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort)算法。If the partition size is fewer than 16 elements, it uses an [insertion sort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort) algorithm. - 如果分区数超过 2 \* LogN，其中*N*是范围的输入数组，它使用[Heapsort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort)算法。If the number of partitions exceeds 2 \* LogN, where *N* is the range of the input array, it uses a [Heapsort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort) algorithm. - 否则，它使用[Quicksort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort)算法。Otherwise, it uses a [Quicksort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort) algorithm. 此实现将执行不稳定排序;也就是说，如果两个元素相等，可能不会保留其顺序。This implementation performs an unstable sort; that is, if two elements are equal, their order might not be preserved. 与此相反，一个稳定排序保留相等元素的顺序。In contrast, a stable sort preserves the order of elements that are equal. 对于在最坏情况下使用 Heapsort 和快速排序算法进行排序的数组，此方法为 O (`n`日志`n`) 操作，其中`n`是`length`。For arrays that are sorted by using the Heapsort and Quicksort algorithms, in the worst case, this method is an O(`n` log `n`) operation, where `n` is `length`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何对中的值进行排序使用默认比较器和将反转排序顺序的自定义比较器。The following code example shows how to sort the values in an using the default comparer and a custom comparer that reverses the sort order. 请注意，结果可能因当前。Note that the result might vary depending on the current . [!code-cpp[System.Array.Sort#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array.Sort/CPP/arraysort.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Array.Sort#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array.Sort/CS/arraysort.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Array.Sort#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array.Sort/VB/arraysort.vb#1)]

span.para: .NET Framework 4 和更早版本使用仅快速排序算法。快速排序标识无效的比较器在某些情况下，在排序操作将引发异常，并且会引发给调用方的异常。从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，就可以，以前排序操作引发了不会引发异常，因为插入排序和 heapsort 算法不检测无效的比较器。大多数情况下，这适用于具有少于 16 个元素的数组。

The .NET Framework 4 and earlier versions used only the Quicksort algorithm. Quicksort identifies invalid comparers in some situations in which the sorting operation throws an exception, and throws an exception to the caller. Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], it is possible that sorting operations that previously threw will not throw an exception, because the insertion sort and heapsort algorithms do not detect an invalid comparer. For the most part, this applies to arrays with fewer than 16 elements.

span.span: Sorts the elements in an entire using the generic interface implementation of each element of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个元素`array`必须实现泛型接口，才能与每个其他元素中的比较的`array`。Each element of `array` must implement the generic interface to be capable of comparisons with every other element in `array`. 如果排序未成功完成，则结果不确定。If the sort is not successfully completed, the results are undefined. 此方法使用内省排序 (introsort) 算法，如下所示：This method uses the introspective sort (introsort) algorithm as follows: - 如果分区大小少于 16 个元素，则使用[插入排序](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort)算法。If the partition size is fewer than 16 elements, it uses an [insertion sort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort) algorithm. - 如果分区数超过 2 \* LogN，其中*N*是范围的输入数组，它使用[Heapsort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort)算法。If the number of partitions exceeds 2 \* LogN, where *N* is the range of the input array, it uses a [Heapsort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort) algorithm. - 否则，它使用[Quicksort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort)算法。Otherwise, it uses a [Quicksort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort) algorithm. 此实现将执行不稳定排序;也就是说，如果两个元素相等，可能不会保留其顺序。This implementation performs an unstable sort; that is, if two elements are equal, their order might not be preserved. 与此相反，一个稳定排序保留相等元素的顺序。In contrast, a stable sort preserves the order of elements that are equal. 对于在最坏情况下使用 Heapsort 和快速排序算法进行排序的数组，此方法为 O (`n`日志`n`) 操作，其中`n`是的`array`。For arrays that are sorted by using the Heapsort and Quicksort algorithms, in the worst case, this method is an O(`n` log `n`) operation, where `n` is the of `array`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示泛型方法重载和泛型方法重载。The following code example demonstrates the generic method overload and the generic method overload. 创建一个字符串数组，顺序不分先后。An array of strings is created, in no particular order. 数组为显示、 已排序，并再次显示。The array is displayed, sorted, and displayed again. > [!NOTE] > 对调用和泛型方法不查找任何不同于调用其非泛型对应项，因为 Visual Basic、 C# 和 c + + 来推断从第一个参数的类型的泛型类型参数的类型。The calls to the and generic methods do not look any different from calls to their nongeneric counterparts, because Visual Basic, C#, and C++ infer the type of the generic type parameter from the type of the first argument. 如果您使用[Ildasm.exe （IL 反汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)若要检查的 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL)，可以看到泛型方法正被调用。If you use the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) to examine the Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL), you can see that the generic methods are being called. 然后使用泛型方法重载来搜索两个字符串，其中一个脚本并不在数组，另一个是。The generic method overload is then used to search for two strings, one that is not in the array and one that is. 数组和返回值的方法传递给`ShowWhere`泛型方法，如果找到该字符串，否则元素的搜索字符串将介于在数组中显示的索引值。The array and the return value of the method are passed to the `ShowWhere` generic method, which displays the index value if the string is found, and otherwise the elements the search string would fall between if it were in the array. 索引为负，如果字符串不是 n 数组，因此`ShowWhere`方法采用按位求补 (~ 运算符在 C# 和 Visual c + +，`Xor`在 Visual Basic 中的为-1) 若要获取大于搜索 stri 列表中的第一个元素的索引ng。The index is negative if the string is not n the array, so the `ShowWhere` method takes the bitwise complement (the ~ operator in C# and Visual C++, `Xor` -1 in Visual Basic) to obtain the index of the first element in the list that is larger than the search string. [!code-cpp[Array_SortSearch#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Array_SortSearch/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Array_SortSearch#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Array_SortSearch/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Array_SortSearch#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Array_SortSearch/vb/source.vb#1)]

span.para: .NET Framework 4 和更早版本使用仅快速排序算法。快速排序标识无效的比较器在某些情况下，在排序操作将引发异常，并且会引发给调用方的异常。从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，就可以，以前排序操作引发了不会引发异常，因为插入排序和 heapsort 算法不检测无效的比较器。大多数情况下，这适用于具有少于 16 个元素的数组。

The .NET Framework 4 and earlier versions used only the Quicksort algorithm. Quicksort identifies invalid comparers in some situations in which the sorting operation throws an exception, and throws an exception to the caller. Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], it is possible that sorting operations that previously threw will not throw an exception, because the insertion sort and heapsort algorithms do not detect an invalid comparer. For the most part, this applies to arrays with fewer than 16 elements.

that is, if two elements are equal, their order might not be preserved. 与此相反，一个稳定排序保留相等元素的顺序。In contrast, a stable sort preserves the order of elements that are equal. 对于在最坏情况下使用 Heapsort 和快速排序算法进行排序的数组，此方法为 O (`n`日志`n`) 操作，其中`n`是的`array`。For arrays that are sorted by using the Heapsort and Quicksort algorithms, in the worst case, this method is an O(`n` log `n`) operation, where `n` is the of `array`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了方法重载。The following code example demonstrates the method overload. 代码示例定义名为的字符串替换比较方法`CompareDinosByLength`。The code example defines an alternative comparison method for strings, named `CompareDinosByLength`. 此方法的工作方式如下： 首先 comparandsare 测试为`null`，并为 null 引用被视为小于非空。This method works as follows: First, the comparandsare tested for`null`, and a null reference is treated as less than a non-null. 其次，比较字符串长度，并更长的字符串被认为更高版本。Second, the string lengths are compared, and the longer string is deemed to be greater. 第三，如果长度相等，则使用常规字符串比较。Third, if the lengths are equal, ordinary string comparison is used. 创建并填充了四个字符串，不按特定顺序的字符串数组。A array of strings is created and populated with four strings, in no particular order. 列表还包括一个空字符串和 null 引用。The list also includes an empty string and a null reference. 显示列表，使用排序泛型委托表示`CompareDinosByLength`方法，并再次显示。The list is displayed, sorted using a generic delegate representing the `CompareDinosByLength` method, and displayed again. remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的元素指定的范围内的每个元素`array`必须实现泛型接口，才能与每个其他元素中的比较的`array`。Each element within the specified range of elements in `array` must implement the generic interface to be capable of comparisons with every other element in `array`. 如果排序未成功完成，则结果不确定。If the sort is not successfully completed, the results are undefined. 此方法使用内省排序 (introsort) 算法，如下所示：This method uses the introspective sort (introsort) algorithm as follows: - 如果分区大小少于 16 个元素，则使用[插入排序](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort)算法。If the partition size is fewer than 16 elements, it uses an [insertion sort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort) algorithm. - 如果分区数超过 2 \* LogN，其中*N*是范围的输入数组，它使用[Heapsort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort)算法。If the number of partitions exceeds 2 \* LogN, where *N* is the range of the input array, it uses a [Heapsort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort) algorithm. - 否则，它使用[Quicksort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort)算法。Otherwise, it uses a [Quicksort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort) algorithm. 此实现将执行不稳定排序;也就是说，如果两个元素相等，可能不会保留其顺序。This implementation performs an unstable sort; that is, if two elements are equal, their order might not be preserved. 与此相反，一个稳定排序保留相等元素的顺序。In contrast, a stable sort preserves the order of elements that are equal. 对于在最坏情况下使用 Heapsort 和快速排序算法进行排序的数组，此方法为 O (`n`日志`n`) 操作，其中`n`是`length`。For arrays that are sorted by using the Heapsort and Quicksort algorithms, in the worst case, this method is an O(`n` log `n`) operation, where `n` is `length`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示泛型方法重载和数组中的范围进行排序的泛型方法重载。The following code example demonstrates the generic method overload and the generic method overload for sorting a range in an array. 代码示例定义一个名为`ReverseCompare`，它实现`IComparer`(`IComparer(Of String)`在 Visual Basic 中`IComparer`Visual c + +) 泛型接口。The code example defines an alternative comparer for strings, named `ReverseCompare`, which implements the `IComparer` (`IComparer(Of String)` in Visual Basic, `IComparer` in Visual C++) generic interface. 该比较器调用方法中，反转比较字的顺序，使字符串对高到低而不是低到高进行排序。The comparer calls the method, reversing the order of the comparands so that the strings sort high-to-low instead of low-to-high. 代码示例创建并显示包含的三个食肉恐龙 (tyrannosaurids，确切地说) 后跟三个草食的恐龙名称的数组。The code example creates and displays an array of dinosaur names, consisting of three herbivores followed by three carnivores (tyrannosaurids, to be precise). 使用泛型方法重载进行排序的数组，随后显示的最后三个元素。The generic method overload is used to sort the last three elements of the array, which is then displayed. 与使用泛型方法重载`ReverseCompare`按相反的顺序排序的最后三个元素。The generic method overload is used with `ReverseCompare` to sort the last three elements in reverse order. 彻底无恐龙都暗示会再次显示。The thoroughly confused dinosaurs are displayed again. > [!NOTE] > 对调用和泛型方法不查找任何不同于调用其非泛型对应项，因为 Visual Basic、 C# 和 c + + 来推断从第一个参数的类型的泛型类型参数的类型。The calls to the and generic methods do not look any different from calls to their nongeneric counterparts, because Visual Basic, C#, and C++ infer the type of the generic type parameter from the type of the first argument. 如果您使用[Ildasm.exe （IL 反汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)若要检查的 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL)，可以看到泛型方法正被调用。If you use the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) to examine the Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL), you can see that the generic methods are being called. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`comparer`是`null`，每个元素中的元素指定的范围内`array`必须实现泛型接口，才能与每个其他元素中的比较的`array`。If `comparer` is `null`, each element within the specified range of elements in `array` must implement the generic interface to be capable of comparisons with every other element in `array`. 如果排序未成功完成，则结果不确定。If the sort is not successfully completed, the results are undefined. 此方法使用内省排序 (introsort) 算法，如下所示：This method uses the introspective sort (introsort) algorithm as follows: - 如果分区大小少于 16 个元素，则使用[插入排序](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort)算法。If the partition size is fewer than 16 elements, it uses an [insertion sort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort) algorithm. - 如果分区数超过 2 \* LogN，其中*N*是范围的输入数组，它使用[Heapsort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort)算法。If the number of partitions exceeds 2 \* LogN, where *N* is the range of the input array, it uses a [Heapsort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort) algorithm. - 否则，它使用[Quicksort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort)算法。Otherwise, it uses a [Quicksort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort) algorithm. 此实现将执行不稳定排序;也就是说，如果两个元素相等，可能不会保留其顺序。This implementation performs an unstable sort; that is, if two elements are equal, their order might not be preserved. 与此相反，一个稳定排序保留相等元素的顺序。In contrast, a stable sort preserves the order of elements that are equal. 对于在最坏情况下使用 Heapsort 和快速排序算法进行排序的数组，此方法为 O (`n`日志`n`) 操作，其中`n`是`length`。For arrays that are sorted by using the Heapsort and Quicksort algorithms, in the worst case, this method is an O(`n` log `n`) operation, where `n` is `length`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示泛型方法重载和数组中的范围进行排序的泛型方法重载。The following code example demonstrates the generic method overload and the generic method overload for sorting a range in an array. 代码示例定义一个名为`ReverseCompare`，它实现`IComparer`(`IComparer(Of String)`在 Visual Basic 中`IComparer`Visual c + +) 泛型接口。The code example defines an alternative comparer for strings, named `ReverseCompare`, which implements the `IComparer` (`IComparer(Of String)` in Visual Basic, `IComparer` in Visual C++) generic interface. 该比较器调用方法中，反转比较字的顺序，使字符串对高到低而不是低到高进行排序。The comparer calls the method, reversing the order of the comparands so that the strings sort high-to-low instead of low-to-high. 代码示例创建并显示包含的三个食肉恐龙 (tyrannosaurids，确切地说) 后跟三个草食的恐龙名称的数组。The code example creates and displays an array of dinosaur names, consisting of three herbivores followed by three carnivores (tyrannosaurids, to be precise). 使用泛型方法重载进行排序的数组，随后显示的最后三个元素。The generic method overload is used to sort the last three elements of the array, which is then displayed. 与使用泛型方法重载`ReverseCompare`按相反的顺序排序的最后三个元素。The generic method overload is used with `ReverseCompare` to sort the last three elements in reverse order. 彻底无恐龙都暗示会再次显示。The thoroughly confused dinosaurs are displayed again. > [!NOTE] > 对调用和泛型方法不查找任何不同于调用其非泛型对应项，因为 Visual Basic、 C# 和 c + + 来推断从第一个参数的类型的泛型类型参数的类型。The calls to the and generic methods do not look any different from calls to their nongeneric counterparts, because Visual Basic, C#, and C++ infer the type of the generic type parameter from the type of the first argument. 如果您使用[Ildasm.exe （IL 反汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)若要检查的 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL)，可以看到泛型方法正被调用。If you use the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) to examine the Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL), you can see that the generic methods are being called. [!code-cpp[Array_SortIntIntIComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Array_SortIntIntIComparer/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Array_SortIntIntIComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Array_SortIntIntIComparer/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Array_SortIntIntIComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Array_SortIntIntIComparer/vb/source.vb#1)]

span.para: .NET Framework 4 和更早版本使用仅快速排序算法。快速排序标识无效的比较器在某些情况下，在排序操作将引发异常，并且会引发给调用方的异常。从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，就可以，以前排序操作引发了不会引发异常，因为插入排序和 heapsort 算法不检测无效的比较器。大多数情况下，这适用于具有少于 16 个元素的数组。

The .NET Framework 4 and earlier versions used only the Quicksort algorithm. Quicksort identifies invalid comparers in some situations in which the sorting operation throws an exception, and throws an exception to the caller. Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], it is possible that sorting operations that previously threw will not throw an exception, because the insertion sort and heapsort algorithms do not detect an invalid comparer. For the most part, this applies to arrays with fewer than 16 elements.

summary.span: 基于第一个 中的关键字，使用每个关键字的 泛型接口实现，对两个 对象（一个包含关键字，另一个包含对应的项）进行排序。

span.span: Sorts a pair of objects (one contains the keys and the other contains the corresponding items) based on the keys in the first using the generic interface implementation of each key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在每个键`keys`都有对应项`items` 。Each key in the `keys` has a corresponding item in the `items`. 在排序中的相应项过程时重新定位一个键`items`同样重新定位。When a key is repositioned during the sorting, the corresponding item in the `items` is similarly repositioned. 因此， `items` 按照中的对应键的排列方式排序`keys` 。Therefore, the `items` is sorted according to the arrangement of the corresponding keys in the `keys`. 在每个键`keys`必须实现泛型接口，才能与其他任何关键字进行比较。Each key in the `keys` must implement the generic interface to be capable of comparisons with every other key. 如果有更多的项比密钥，但不是进行排序有没有对应的键的项，您可以进行排序。You can sort if there are more items than keys, but the items that have no corresponding keys will not be sorted. 如果以上的项; 更多密钥不能进行排序这样做将引发。You cannot sort if there are more keys than items; doing this throws an . 如果排序未成功完成，则结果不确定。If the sort is not successfully completed, the results are undefined. 此方法使用内省排序 (introsort) 算法，如下所示：This method uses the introspective sort (introsort) algorithm as follows: - 如果分区大小少于 16 个元素，则使用[插入排序](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort)算法。If the partition size is fewer than 16 elements, it uses an [insertion sort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort) algorithm. - 如果分区数超过 2 \* LogN，其中*N*是范围的输入数组，它使用[Heapsort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort)算法。If the number of partitions exceeds 2 \* LogN, where *N* is the range of the input array, it uses a [Heapsort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort) algorithm. - 否则，它使用[Quicksort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort)算法。Otherwise, it uses a [Quicksort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort) algorithm. 此实现将执行不稳定排序;也就是说，如果两个元素相等，可能不会保留其顺序。This implementation performs an unstable sort; that is, if two elements are equal, their order might not be preserved. 与此相反，一个稳定排序保留相等元素的顺序。In contrast, a stable sort preserves the order of elements that are equal. 对于在最坏情况下使用 Heapsort 和快速排序算法进行排序的数组，此方法为 O (`n`日志`n`) 操作，其中`n`是的`array`。For arrays that are sorted by using the Heapsort and Quicksort algorithms, in the worst case, this method is an O(`n` log `n`) operation, where `n` is the of `array`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示， ， ，和泛型方法重载，对表示键和值的数组进行排序。The following code example demonstrates the , , , and generic method overloads, for sorting pairs of arrays that represent keys and values. 代码示例定义一个名为`ReverseCompare`，它实现`IComparer`(`IComparer(Of String)`在 Visual Basic 中`IComparer`Visual c + +) 泛型接口。The code example defines an alternative comparer for strings, named `ReverseCompare`, which implements the `IComparer` (`IComparer(Of String)` in Visual Basic, `IComparer` in Visual C++) generic interface. 该比较器调用方法中，反转比较字的顺序，使字符串对高到低而不是低到高进行排序。The comparer calls the method, reversing the order of the comparands so that the strings sort high-to-low instead of low-to-high. 代码示例创建并显示恢复不复存在名称 （键） 的数组，表示以米为单位 （值） 的每个恢复不复存在的最大长度的整数数组。The code example creates and displays an array of dinosaur names (the keys) and an array of integers representing the maximum length of each dinosaur in meters (the values). 然后，数组进行排序和显示几次：The arrays are then sorted and displayed several times: - 重载用于对这两个数组中的第一个数组中的恐龙名称顺序进行排序。The overload is used to sort both arrays in order of the dinosaur names in the first array. - 重载和实例`ReverseCompare`用于反转排序顺序的配对的数组。The overload and an instance of `ReverseCompare` are used to reverse the sort order of the paired arrays. - 使用重载的两个数组的最后三个元素进行排序。The overload is used to sort the last three elements of both arrays. - 重载用于按相反的顺序对两个数组的最后三个元素进行排序。The overload is used to sort the last three elements of both arrays in reverse order. > [!NOTE] > 对泛型方法的调用不查找下面任何不同于调用其非泛型对应项，因为 Visual Basic、 C# 和 c + + 来推断与前两个参数的类型的泛型类型参数的类型。The calls to the generic methods do not look any different from calls to their nongeneric counterparts, because Visual Basic, C#, and C++ infer the type of the generic type parameter from the type of the first two arguments. 如果您使用[Ildasm.exe （IL 反汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)若要检查的 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL)，可以看到泛型方法正被调用。If you use the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) to examine the Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL), you can see that the generic methods are being called. [!code-cpp[Array_Sort2IntIntIComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Array_Sort2IntIntIComparer/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Array_Sort2IntIntIComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Array_Sort2IntIntIComparer/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Array_Sort2IntIntIComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Array_Sort2IntIntIComparer/vb/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 基于第一个 中的关键字，使用每个关键字的 泛型接口实现，对两个 对象（一个包含关键字，另一个包含对应的项）的部分元素进行排序。

span.span: Sorts a range of elements in a pair of objects (one contains the keys and the other contains the corresponding items) based on the keys in the first using the generic interface implementation of each key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在每个键`keys`都有对应项`items` 。Each key in the `keys` has a corresponding item in the `items`. 在排序中的相应项过程时重新定位一个键`items`同样重新定位。When a key is repositioned during the sorting, the corresponding item in the `items` is similarly repositioned. 因此， `items` 按照中的对应键的排列方式排序`keys` 。Therefore, the `items` is sorted according to the arrangement of the corresponding keys in the `keys`. 中的元素指定的范围内的每个键`keys`必须实现泛型接口，才能与其他任何关键字进行比较。Each key within the specified range of elements in the `keys` must implement the generic interface to be capable of comparisons with every other key. 如果有更多的项比密钥，但不是进行排序有没有对应的键的项，您可以进行排序。You can sort if there are more items than keys, but the items that have no corresponding keys will not be sorted. 如果以上的项; 更多密钥不能进行排序这样做将引发。You cannot sort if there are more keys than items; doing this throws an . 如果排序未成功完成，则结果不确定。If the sort is not successfully completed, the results are undefined. 此方法使用内省排序 (introsort) 算法，如下所示：This method uses the introspective sort (introsort) algorithm as follows: - 如果分区大小少于 16 个元素，则使用[插入排序](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort)算法。If the partition size is fewer than 16 elements, it uses an [insertion sort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort) algorithm. - 如果分区数超过 2 \* LogN，其中*N*是范围的输入数组，它使用[Heapsort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort)算法。If the number of partitions exceeds 2 \* LogN, where *N* is the range of the input array, it uses a [Heapsort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort) algorithm. - 否则，它使用[Quicksort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort)算法。Otherwise, it uses a [Quicksort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort) algorithm. 此实现将执行不稳定排序;也就是说，如果两个元素相等，可能不会保留其顺序。This implementation performs an unstable sort; that is, if two elements are equal, their order might not be preserved. 与此相反，一个稳定排序保留相等元素的顺序。In contrast, a stable sort preserves the order of elements that are equal. 对于在最坏情况下使用 Heapsort 和快速排序算法进行排序的数组，此方法为 O (`n`日志`n`) 操作，其中`n`是`length`。For arrays that are sorted by using the Heapsort and Quicksort algorithms, in the worst case, this method is an O(`n` log `n`) operation, where `n` is `length`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示， ，[\]，TValue\，和泛型方法重载，对表示键和值的数组进行排序。The following code example demonstrates the , , [\], TValue\, and generic method overloads, for sorting pairs of arrays that represent keys and values. 代码示例定义一个名为`ReverseCompare`，它实现`IComparer`(`IComparer(Of String)`在 Visual Basic 中`IComparer`Visual c + +) 泛型接口。The code example defines an alternative comparer for strings, named `ReverseCompare`, which implements the `IComparer` (`IComparer(Of String)` in Visual Basic, `IComparer` in Visual C++) generic interface. 该比较器调用方法中，反转比较字的顺序，使字符串对高到低而不是低到高进行排序。The comparer calls the method, reversing the order of the comparands so that the strings sort high-to-low instead of low-to-high. 代码示例创建并显示恢复不复存在名称 （键） 的数组，表示以米为单位 （值） 的每个恢复不复存在的最大长度的整数数组。The code example creates and displays an array of dinosaur names (the keys) and an array of integers representing the maximum length of each dinosaur in meters (the values). 然后，数组进行排序和显示几次：The arrays are then sorted and displayed several times: - 重载用于对这两个数组中的第一个数组中的恐龙名称顺序进行排序。The overload is used to sort both arrays in order of the dinosaur names in the first array. - 重载和实例`ReverseCompare`用于反转排序顺序的配对的数组。The overload and an instance of `ReverseCompare` are used to reverse the sort order of the paired arrays. - [\]，TValue\ 使用重载的两个数组的最后三个元素进行排序。The [\], TValue\ overload is used to sort the last three elements of both arrays. - 重载用于按相反的顺序对两个数组的最后三个元素进行排序。The overload is used to sort the last three elements of both arrays in reverse order. > [!NOTE] > 对泛型方法的调用不查找下面任何不同于调用其非泛型对应项，因为 Visual Basic、 C# 和 c + + 来推断与前两个参数的类型的泛型类型参数的类型。The calls to the generic methods do not look any different from calls to their nongeneric counterparts, because Visual Basic, C#, and C++ infer the type of the generic type parameter from the type of the first two arguments. 如果您使用[Ildasm.exe （IL 反汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)若要检查的 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL)，可以看到泛型方法正被调用。If you use the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) to examine the Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL), you can see that the generic methods are being called. [!code-cpp[Array_Sort2IntIntIComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Array_Sort2IntIntIComparer/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Array_Sort2IntIntIComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Array_Sort2IntIntIComparer/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Array_Sort2IntIntIComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Array_Sort2IntIntIComparer/vb/source.vb#1)]

span.para: .NET Framework 4 和更早版本使用仅快速排序算法。快速排序标识无效的比较器在某些情况下，在排序操作将引发异常，并且会引发给调用方的异常。从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，就可以，以前排序操作引发了不会引发异常，因为插入排序和 heapsort 算法不检测无效的比较器。大多数情况下，这适用于具有少于 16 个元素的数组。

The .NET Framework 4 and earlier versions used only the Quicksort algorithm. Quicksort identifies invalid comparers in some situations in which the sorting operation throws an exception, and throws an exception to the caller. Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], it is possible that sorting operations that previously threw will not throw an exception, because the insertion sort and heapsort algorithms do not detect an invalid comparer. For the most part, this applies to arrays with fewer than 16 elements.

summary.span: 获取可用于同步对 的访问的对象。

span.span: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the .

value.span: 可用于同步对 的访问的对象。

span.span: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性实现接口。This property implements the interface. .NET framework 类基于提供集合使用其自己的同步的版本属性。.NET Framework classes based on provide their own synchronized version of the collection using the property. 使用数组的类还可实现其自己的同步使用属性。Classes that use arrays can also implement their own synchronization using the property. 同步代码必须在执行操作`SyncRoot`的不是直接对集合的集合。The synchronizing code must perform operations on the `SyncRoot` of the collection, not directly on the collection. 这样可确保对从其他对象派生的集合正确地执行操作。This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects. 具体而言，它维护与其他线程可能同时修改集合的正确同步。Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the collection. 请注意，某些实现的可能会返回本身。Note that some implementations of might return the itself. 枚举整个集合本质上不是线程安全的过程。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure. 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何通过在整个枚举期间锁定数组属性。The following code example shows how to lock an array during the entire enumeration by using the property. [!code-cpp[System.Array.SyncRoot#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array.SyncRoot/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Array.SyncRoot#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array.SyncRoot/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Array.SyncRoot#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array.SyncRoot/vb/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是返回的方法的委托`true`如果该对象传递给委托中定义的条件匹配。The is a delegate to a method that returns`true` if the object passed to it matches the conditions defined in the delegate. 元素`array`逐个传递给，并且在委托返回时停止处理`false`的任何元素。The elements of `array` are individually passed to the , and processing is stopped when the delegate returns `false` for any element. 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是的`array`。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the of `array`. ## Examples 下面的示例确定一个字符串数组中每个元素的最后一个字符是否是一个数字。The following example determines whether the last character of each element in a string array is a number. 它将创建两个字符串数组。It creates two string arrays. 第一个 arrayincludes 同时字符串结尾字母字符和字符串和数字的字符结尾。第二个数组仅包含数字字符结尾的字符串。The first arrayincludes both strings that end with alphabetic characters and strings that end with numeric characters.The second array consists only of strings that end with numeric characters. 该示例还定义了`EndWithANumber`方法，其签名与匹配委托。The example also defines an `EndWithANumber` method whose signature matches the delegate. 该示例将为每个数组方法以及一个委托，表示`EndsWithANumber`方法。The example passes each array to the method along with a delegate that represents the `EndsWithANumber` method. [!code-csharp[System.Array.TrueForAll#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.array.trueforall/cs/trueforall2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Array.TrueForAll#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.array.trueforall/vb/trueforall2.vb#2)] 下面的示例是类似于第一个，只不过它将传递到的字符串数组方法以及确定是否从特定的数组元素结尾的数字的字符串表示形式的 lambda 表达式。The following example is similar to the first, except that it passes the string array to the method along with a lambda expression that determines whether a particular array element ends with the string representation of a number. [!code-csharp[System.Array.TrueForAll#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.array.trueforall/cs/trueforall1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Array.TrueForAll#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.array.trueforall/vb/trueforall1.vb#1)] 在这两种情况下，方法将返回`false`一旦遇到不以数字结尾的第一个数组元素。In both cases, the method returns `false` as soon as it encounters the first array element that does not end in a number. 否则，它将返回`true`后循环访问数组中的所有元素。Otherwise, it returns `true` after iterating all the elements in the array. > [!NOTE] > 如这两个示例所示，在 C# 和 Visual Basic 中，不需要创建`Predicate`委托 (`Predicate(Of String)`在 Visual Basic 中) 显式。As both examples show, in C# and Visual Basic, it is not necessary to create the `Predicate` delegate (`Predicate(Of String)` in Visual Basic) explicitly. 这些语言推断从上下文正确的委托，并自动创建。These languages infer the correct delegate from context and create it automatically.
